summary: A party-game based on the French movie Bienvenue chez les Ch'tis.

name: Bienvenue chez les Ch'tis
summary: The DS port for the party-game based on the French movie Bienvenue chez les Ch'tis.

name: Birth of the Empires
summary: A 4x Turn Based strategy game similar to classics like Master of Orion 2 or Birth of the Federation

name: Big Mess

name: Bi-Color

name: Biden My Time: A Joe Biden Garfield-Reading Simulator

name: Big Donut

name: Bird Builder
summary: Build birds of some shapes and sizes.

name: Biketrial Experience

name: Bird Butt Battle Royale

name: Birthday Blues
summary: i hate my birthday

name: Bitter Sweet Memories
summary: A dreaming wolf in a city where anything is possible, never did he think that it would be this...

name: Bitcoin Bounty Hunt
summary: Bitcoin-native Online FPS

name: BitLife DE
summary:
How will you live your BitLife?

Will you try to make all the right choices in an attempt to become a model citizen sometime before you die? You could marry the love of your life, have kids, and pick up a good education along the way.

Or will you play choices that horrify your parents? You could descend into a life of crime, fall in love or go on adventures, start prison riots, smuggle duffle bags, and cheat on your spouse. You choose your story...

Discover how bit by bit life choices can add up to determine your success in life the game.

Interactive story games have been around for years. But this is the first text life simulator to truly mash up and simulate adult life.

name: Big Brother Brasil 3D Online
summary:
Welcome to Big Brother Brasil 3D Online, as in the program with a big audience throughout Brazil, you will interact online, in real-time, with other participants of the house.

Now the emotions are real and live, you will be able to get to know the participants of the house better, date, plot, have fun, and participate in the competitions to be the HoH of the week.

Choose your character and configure your personal characteristics, change your humor, companionship and charisma.

name: Bio Evil 4

name: Biohazard

name: Bikrash

name: BiggerNouis
summary: A Teeworlds / DDraceNetwork themed puzzle game

name: Bitterroot
summary: Game Boy horror game about a haunted mansion and its secrets.

name: Bird by Example
summary: Deep Learning Bird RPG

name: Bit Pong
summary: A game about a ball and a cup

name: Binary Blocks
summary: Binary Blocks is mainly a game about building binary trees.

name: Bipo's Adventure
summary: A short platformer.

name: Bit Jail
summary: You're jailed in someone else's house!

name: Big Trouble in Little Garden
summary: A little game about spring.

name: Bimsy Dreams
summary: Wacky microgame fun in 64x64!

name: Bigger Than Me
summary: Point & click graphic (mis)adventure about Max, a young man full of uncertainties with a peculiar problem: he becomes giant everytime he hears the word 'FUTURE'. Puzzles, minigames and existential crises spiced up with humor in a story about growing up in a world that seems to be ending.

name: Big Larry
summary: The rainy night starts with a simple favor. Suddenly realizing youre trapped and alone... your fight or flight response kicks in. Especially when the creepy school mascot was just found DEAD. Figure out puzzles, watch your surroundings and most importantly do not disturb BIG LARRY.

name: Bickadoodle

name: Bizzarioware
summary: Bizzarioware is an ongoing collection of psychedelic, strange and surreal microgames played for 15 seconds or less.

name: Bimbo Sequencer 2
summary:
Bimbo Sequencer 2 is an adult transformation puzzle game. Funded via Patreon and inspired by EYEZMAZE's GROW games, it tasks the player with figuring out the correct combination to transform the protagonist into a bimbo.

Will you unlock the perfect bimbo or will you turn her into something else...?

name: Bitburner
summary: Bitburner is a programming-based incremental game. Write scripts in JavaScript to automate gameplay, learn skills, play minigames, solve puzzles, and more in this cyberpunk text-based incremental RPG.

name: Bit of War
summary: An 8-Bit demake of God of War, this game is a love letter to both the series itself as well as old school gaming in general.

name: Big Booty Adventures
summary: Glory awaits! Hoard your treasures and battle enemies as you move through a physically challenging world. Learn to wield a variety of weapons and strategize your assault to obtain loads of booty. Explore the world to find hidden treasures to customize your playstyle and enhance your abilities.

name: Bit Adventure
summary: Bit adventure-created by indie Studio Lord Game LLC, and is a casual arcade game. The game boasts Multiplatforms, it works both in the browser and on all operating systems.

name: Bimous
summary: In Bimous, you are in a region with different biomes and enemy species such as yetis, goblins and wizards. Explore the map, discover new buildings, fight enemies and destroy whatever you want.

name: Biker Garage: Mechanic Simulator
summary: Biker Garage: Mechanic Simulator allows you to be a top motorcycle mechanic. Your main aim is to be the best mechanic you can, with loads of really happy clients. You start your adventure in a small home workshop which you will need to grow to become the best motorcycle mechanic in the world. Test your bikes on a track, check the quality of your repairs and improve bike performance with fine-tuning. Not only do you customize motorcycles at the request of customers, but you can also create your own dream machine. Find a bike at the junkyard or buy it from a shop and change it beyond recognition while choosing from hundreds of different parts. When you expand your business (and your garage), you will unlock new features like the auction system, racing, and further skills for more difficult tasks.

name: Biggerman.io
summary: One left-stick rules them ALL! Biggerman - a simple yet satisfying action game for everyone! Smash! Absorb! And Get Bigger!

name: Bitch Government
summary: A princess who abusing her body for diplomacy. But she is getting accustom to sexual excitement, and her important part and thought are getting bad.

name: Birds With Guns
summary: Mess with the Flock, you get the Glock. An Owl-some Roguelike Twin-Stick Shooter.

name: Biztopia
summary: The award-winning business strategy game. Build your business empire! Have fun running your own store in the imaginary land of Biztopia. Pick the right products, corner the market, and outperform your competitors!

name: BitUp
summary: BitUp is a side scrolling, exploration metroidvania game set in a Cubist-Impressionist universe. A game kept hidden by its legendary creator, while its protagonist looks for answers. Players must aid Bit in its quest to find out what lies beyond.

name: Billy Bumbum: A Cheeky Puzzler
summary:
Solve challenging puzzles as a cube with a butt. Flip, push and fart your way through colorful levels as you rescue your adorable friends in need. Fart for freedom!

Use seemingly simple mechanics in surprisingly deep and satisfying ways to rescue your friends in over 250 levels.

name: Bionic Shield: Battle for Space Nebula Omega
summary: In this 2D twin-stick shooter you fly your spaceship, fight in epic space battles, discover new planets, invade new terrain, avoid traps, dodge bullets, customize your weapons and shoot your way through hordes of enemies. A different experience every time you play.

name: Bingiman: Trap Ochido
summary: BINGIMAN: Trap Ochido is a fast paced , boomer shooter inspired video game with a sinister African aesthetic feel through its voodoo and gunplay art direction.

name: Bio Bots
summary: Bio Bots is a Free to play third-person team-based shooter. Enjoy playing chaotic matches in different game-modes

name: Bizarre Mutation World
summary: A science fiction turn-based logic game. Klorofit needs to solve the puzzles to save his pet from genetic mutation.

name: Bit Sword
summary: A 1-bit retro platformer ready for action

name: Bigger Bikes
summary: Bigger Bikes is a simulator of riding bikes, in off-road conditions. The game is based on realistic control of motorcycles and bicycles and fun physics!

name: Bikini Armour Explorers
summary: Pienetta, a weapon store's daughter in a remote country, is fascinated by adventure because of an old map. Fate seemed to see through her mind. Under the influence of some emergencies, Pienetta embarked on an adventure with her three companions.

name: Bingus: My Beloved
summary: Bingus: My Beloved is a visual novel and dating sim where you choose to pursue Bingus or Big Floppa while you attend Zabloing Academy. Join your favorite high school club, make friends, and prepare to enter the Floppaverse!

name: Birding Simulator
summary: Birding Simulator is a first-person photography-exploration game. Get your camera ready, adjust parameters, and gear up to capture unique and rare bird species. Explore varied landscapes and catch the best moments in your photos. Become the best birder in the world!

name: Bigfield 2042
summary: True AAA quality.

name: Bibots
summary: Bibots is a top-down shooter rogue lite set in a futuristic world. Play as Tayar, an explorer in control of a nervy robot and clear rooms filled with monsters, powers and secrets to unveil. Die, try and repeat until you face your world’s final threat.

name: Big Toddlers and Kids Bundle
summary: This bundle contains nine top games for toddlers and kids. Hours of educational and relaxing fun with puzzles, matching pairs, popping balloons, washing cars and more!

name: Big Drug
summary: BIG DRUG - A cooperative adventure game for 1-4 players. Find the criminal before he finds you. Run, search, laugh, but never deceive your brothers.

name: Bikini Tits
summary: So begins a young man's poolside seduction by two very married ladies! Will he finally get the summer break he's been hoping for?!

name: Billy 101
summary: Meet Billy, a robot who is tired of his work on the production lines, who then decided to blow up everything and everyone in order to make his own choices. Shoot robots, solve puzzles with your mechanical arm, blow things up and try not to get blown up before confronting your boss!

name: Binary Golf
summary: Mini-golf with a chaotic twist! Chain abilities, curve shots, and eliminate targets until the last one becomes the cup. Customize your ball, master wild power-ups, and compete in the madness of Battle Mode or uncover the secrets of Story Mode and fight bosses!

name: Biggest Stream Hover Racing
summary: Biggest Stream Hover Racing is a Twitch integrated racing game for windows. With up to 500 viewers racing against the streamer using ai controlled hover cars all kinds of mayhem and fun occurs for both you and your fans.

name: Bike Clash
summary:
Climb as high as possible in the global ranking - in the advanced competition system. Customize your favorite bike to increase speed, train, and win!

Bike Clash is a game where you can challenge players from all over the world! Prove your mountain bike driving skills to them. Get unique trophies indirect multiplayer competition. Compare your results with the best and take part in various events.

Drive through the various mountain and forest trails! Discover new locations, compete with more and more powerful players.

name: Bit Journey
summary: Explore a gigantic, limitless and rich world. It's a brand new open-world experience. The world has gone mad, time travel vortexes are appearing everywhere and spawning incredible enemies that are trying to dominate the whole world while our seven heroes are trying to survive!

name: Bitefight
summary: For many centuries, Vampires and Werewolves have been sworn enemies in a never ending war. In this Massively multiplayer online game, players choose to play the role of a Vampire or a Werewolf, then fight the other species, to ultimately determine who wins this war. Both Vampires and Werewolves have their own powers, bonuses and weaknesses. The player must kill opponents to level up and utilize items to gain a better advantage. Navigating around the world requires the player to interact with an image of the current location and menu options to perform actions.

name: Big Time
summary: Big Time is a multiplayer action RPG that takes players through time and space to encounter some of history's most famous - and infamous - figures. The mission is to reveal a mysterious threat that's tearing down the walls of time and collapsing history in completely unexpected ways. All of this can be experienced through an expansive online game that enables hundreds of players to hack-'n'-slash their way through Big Time's Open World together. Players can form parties, explore Adventure Instances, and defeat enemies for a chance at epic loot.

name: Bincho-tan: Shiawase-goyomi
summary: See the life of "Binchotan" the popular TV anime character in its miniature garden. Meet the friendly animals of the garden and speak with Binchotans friends.

name: Bibi & Tina: New Adventures with Horses
summary: A violent storm has hit the area near Martinshof. Mount up and see what damage the storm has done. Ride across the fields, jump over numerous obstacles and have Bibi the witch magic away the mess. But most of all, you can have lots of fun in fast-paced horse races, show off your jumping and slalom riding skills, take loving care of the horses and send photos to your worried friend Naomi in Australia.

name: Bird and Beast Fantasy
summary: This is a national style pixel art, action role-playing independent game.

name: Bionicle: Kapura Adventures
summary: Step into the shoes of the iconic Matoran Kapura in his quest to move as fast as he can. Bionicle: Kapura Adventures features high-octane gameplay the likes of which you’ve never seen before. Discover the secrets of the island with more than 2 collectibles to unlock, and join Kapura as he undertakes his biggest challenge yet.

name: Bishoujo Battle: Double Strike!
Bicycle Rider Simulator
summary: Bicycle Rider Simulator - is a relaxing game in which there is only you and your bike, travel through various beautiful locations, enjoy scenery and birdsong.

name: Big Tower Tiny Square 2
summary: Return to the revamped ruins of the Big Tower to rescue your Pineapple from the geometric genius, Big Square! Combining mechanics from previous Big Tower Tiny Square games, this Tower challenges you to jump, flap, bounce, and ride your way to revenge!

name: Big Bang Pro Wrestling
summary: It's about to pop off! Muscle-bound wrestlers take the stage for a bombastic all-out brawl! Easy controls allow you to pull off sick and devastating special moves from the push of a button!

name: Bistro Heroes
summary: Gather various ingredients through hunting. Create tasty dishes with special ingredients to run a bistro. Collect hero clothes to create unique styles. Develop your town with numerous buildings and furniture. And…help the heroes save the world!

name: Billy Saves the World
summary: Run, slide, and Rocket Boost through a scifi-vania platformer, or explore, solve puzzles, and talk to the wacky locals to progress through this comedic love story about becoming a better half, for your other half.

name: Bitlands
summary: Platform across strange, magical terrain while meeting even stranger friends and enemies! Discover the history behind the Bitlands, and unlock new allies and powers to traverse the dangerous worlds of the Bitlands, and restore peace to a broken kingdom.

name: Big Screen Games: Pack 1
summary: Time to bring the party into your living room. Introducing Big Screen Games, a party game experience where players use their phones as controllers - and play together on the big screen. Prepare for disastrous doodles, awkward face-offs and a pink cow that wants to ruin your day.

name: Bitch Hell
summary:
Alex is a girl plagued by constant nightmares of flesh, rust and grime.
Fight your way through the night as you spiral into... Bitch Hell.

name: Big's Fishing
summary:
Big's Fishing is an LCD game created for distribution in McDonald's chain of fast food restaurants. They were offered as a part of Happy Meals for a limited time in 2004.

The main goal of the game is to move Big's fishing hook up and down appropriately to catch the fish that appear on the screen. If the player misses 3 fish, the game will end.

The game has a directional pad with only the up and down arrows and also a single button.

name: Bibi Blocksberg: Der Magische Hexenkreis
summary: In this game teenage witch Bibi navigates isometric levels to help out friends and family and flies her broom in 2D side-scrolling levels to fix the mess evil witch Malicia has caused in the city of Neustadt.

name: Biomisland
summary: Biomisland is a relaxing minimalist nature builder game. Visit randomly generated islands and restore nature as your own pace using diverse plants at your disposal.

name: Bike Mechanic Simulator 2023
summary: Repair, service and build bikes. Become a bicycle mechanic and make your workshop a real empire on two wheels. Show off your precision and put equipment to a test. From city bikes to high-performance road and MTB models. It's time for cycling madness!

name: Bit Orchard: Animal Valley
summary: Pull out weeds, plant new apple trees and gather the literal fruits of your labour. With time, you'll discover ways to make your life easier and explore this charming 2D world.

name: Bike Mayhem
summary:
Downhill mountain bike racing like never before. Race down beautiful trails, smashing over rocks and roots, boosting huge jumps, scoring insane trick combos, unlocking better bikes and gear for bragging rights as the King of the Mountain!
Compete in timed races or freestyle trick events on 19 different mountains and over 100 trails inspired by real world locations.

name: Big Truck: Mine Express Racing
summary: Big Truck is a simple, but very fun to play game. You just have to drive a truck across rough terrain and make sure that your goods get to the destination safely. You will get a precise number of goods you carry and a precise number of goods that is required. The more you bring, the more score and coins you get.

name: Birb Café
summary: Birb Café is a coffee-making visual novel about a cute bird helping adventurers on their quests. Your choices matter!

name: Bionicle Heroes
summary: Bionicle Heroes DS is a classic first-person shooter. As a nameless Matoran, you'll travel across 25 themed levels (including jungles, lava-worlds, ancient underground temples) discovering new weapons and new robotic foes to blast apart. Along the way, you'll use the masks' powers to survive the hostile environments as well as collect gears and robot parts to solve simple puzzles by assembling LEGO-style ramps, bridges, and doorways.

name: Bionicle Heroes
summary:
In the GBA version of Bionicle Heroes, based on the LEGO Bionicle franchise, players take on the guise of the Toa Inika team. Set on the island of Voya Nui, they need to retrieve the Mask of Life, stolen by the Piraka gang who also enslaved the Matoran, the native inhabitants, in the process. Unlike the console and the DS versions, a top-down perspective is used.

The game takes place on six zones of the island, followed by a final showdown. The player starts as a Toa of Fire, but by completing zones and killing the level boss, additional masks can be collected: Air, Stone, Ice, Earth and Water. Each Toa has a primary and secondary weapon based on the mask's elemental nature, with specific features. During the levels, there are also weapon upgrades to be found. The second weapon is limited by an energy meter which needs some time to recharge. Each zone requires a specific Toa guise, but in the Free Play mode completed levels can be revisited and players can then switch between the forms at any time to use different abilities. Toa can strafe while fighting - there is an option to face enemies automatically or to control this manually.

name: Big Mutha Truckers 2
summary: The truckers return and this time you have to get Ma Jackson off the hook after being arrested for tax evasion. Bribe the jurors as you take the roll of Ma's cousin Jacob in a race to make money by trucking and trading. Drive and go almost everywhere at any time in a bigger environment than the original finding shortcuts and new towns to go trucking in. Trading is only a small part of the game and has been simplified to allow more time driving.

name: Big Brother
summary: Big Brother is a cancelled PC game based on George Orwell's novel 1984.

name: Big the Cat in Sonic the Hedgehog
summary: A ROM hack for Sonic the Hedgehog which swaps Sonic for Big the Cat (from Sonic Adventure), with his moveset based on a previous mod from the same author, Sonic the Hedgehog 2: Pink Edition.

name: Bit Orchard: Animal Valley - Deluxe Edition
summary: Alongside the base game our bundle provides you with the Deluxe Theme Pack. The DLC includes nice gifts: 10 seeds and 100 coins, you can also change the colors of your world. Upgrade your orchard Sell your apples to earn money and improve your orchard. …

name: Bitterheim
summary: first jam, first abomination

name: Bingo Master
summary: A relaxing game of Bingo. Run a game for virtual players, or use it to call a real game of Bingo.

name: Bird and Beans
summary: A remake of the 2009 DSiWare arcade game, Bird and Beans.

name: Bits & Bops
summary: Bits & Bops is a collection of original rhythm mini-games. Featuring over 20 mini-games filled with catchy music, snappy gameplay and gorgeous, hand-drawn animation, Bits & Bops is sure to brighten your day.

name: Bioxotica
summary: Cultivate an exotic homestead - Bioxotica! Grow a ranch of peculiar plants and collectible creatures. Create structures and grand habitats. Will you discover the secrets of this wild land and create a flourishing settlement for the inhabitants on this exotic frontier?

name: Biotronic
summary:
Puzzle game features colorful biotechnology. Its highlights: easy mouse controls, exploding combos and beautiful animations.

Challenge yourself and your friends in this exciting game.

name: Bitsy Mystery Dungeon
summary: This game is the result of a massive collaboration on the Bitsy Discord. 34 separate bitsyfolk each created a room. The project was built as an "exquisite corpse" - every room was constructed separately, and while variables were shared between participants to allow cross-room gameplay, the final layout of the maze was randomised.

name: Bionic Tadpole
summary: A run-n-gun, non-stop action platformer-shooter! Pick up a weapon. A jetpack. A force shield. All while evading bullet-hell madness! Oh, and be mindful not to let your gun overheat...

name: Bike Jump
summary: Become a crazy bike stunt driver! How far can you jump?

name: Bill and Ted's Excellent Retro Collection
summary: A blast from the past! Bill & Ted's Retro Collection includes Bill & Ted's Excellent Video Game Adventure and Bill & Ted's Excellent Gameboy Adventure A Bogus Journey!

name: BioCrisis: Return 2 the Lab
summary: The alert has been given, the virus is on the loose, you've escaped the lab, the city will be nuked!

name: Binary Run
summary: The Reformat is inevitable. The Virus Spreads. Keep Running. Binary Run is a fast paced retro shooter inspired by 80s synthwave and retro shooters. Kill, collect and run your way through a corrupted digitial world, Keep Running.

name: Biters & Bullets
summary: Kill thousands of zombies, collect loot, and become a lean mean killing machine! Battle and survive hordes of monsters in this high octane casual game with rogue-lite elements. Defeat bosses, hot-wire cars and stack power-ups to infinity. How long will you survive?

name: Bionic Bay
summary: An ordinary man in an extraordinary world. Bionic Bay is a new kind of a 2D platformer. It introduces a unique Swap mechanic, allowing players to interact with the physics-based world in new ways. The immersive gameplay is completed by spectacular environments and creative level design.

name: Birth
summary: Birth is a pleasantly creepy point-and-click puzzle game about living alone in a large city and constructing a creature to keep you company out of spare bones and organs you find lying around. Explore libraries, post offices, museums, cafes, and apartments that don't belong to you, solving observational puzzles hidden in personal belongings and scenery.

name: Big Fat Awesome House Party
summary: Big Fat Awesome House Party was an online video game created by Cartoon Network's interactive division and Powerful Robot Games featuring the characters of Foster's Home for Imaginary Friends, and was similar to the Nintendo's Animal Crossing series.

name: Biwar: Legend of Dragon Slayer
summary: Biwar Legend Of Dragon Slayer is Action-Adventure Puzzle use the Magic Mechanic such a: Telekinesis Power, Agni and Toya Elements, and Non Euclidean puzzles

name: BiblioMania
summary: BiblioMania is a multiplayer 2D platformer where you are a clerk in a cursed library. Work with (or triumph over) up to 3 friends while taking in and renting out books to many clients. But beware the events that happen at the library, they can change everything.

name: Bike Unchained 2
summary:
Bike Unchained 2 from Red Bull is the sequel to the #1 mountain bike game on mobile! Race against real riders in PvP Downhill action, or line up your best tricks in Slopestyle competitions. Will you be on top of the podium when the dust settles?
Gear up for the world's biggest mountain bike competition in Bike Unchained 2! Prove you're the fastest on the mountain in ranked league racing and take home the title of the world's top rider. Send it in Slopestyle runs that test your style and skill. Pedal through five different environments with trails that offer gnarly rock gardens, fast flowy singletrack, and everything in between. Customize every part of your ride and your look with an insane amount of parts and gear. Tell the world you're the best and look good doing it! We'll see you at the bottom.

name: Big Earth
summary: In a post-apocalyptic future where Earth's resources have been consumed, Kyle Seed tries to recover capsules containing special seeds and the energy needed to save humanity's future. Big Earth is a platform game with challenging puzzles.

name: Bingo
summary: Bingo is a simulation of the game of Bingo, which also includes a simulation of the game of Keno.

name: Binary.
summary: The insane combo action game for Combat manias.

name: Bip + Bop
summary: Bip and Bop's worlds are converging - and it looks pretty scary! Help Bip and Bop return their worlds to order by alternating between them and compounding their unique abilities!

name: Bill & Ted's Excellent Retro Collection: Collector's Edition
summary: A blast from the past! Bill & Ted's Retro Collection includes BIll & Ted's Excellent Video Game Adventure and Bill & Ted's Excellent Gameboy Adventure A bogus Journey!

name: Birb Race
summary: Race to be the fastest Birb in the world! Train your walking, climbing, gliding and swimming in 4 training games to improve yourself in the racing arena! Earn seeds to buy upgrades and unlock trophies to show off your skill!

name: Big Flying Asteroid
summary: A fun little space shooter inspired by the 1979 classic Asteroids.

name: BioGloom
summary: BioGloom is a 2-D survival adventure game made by Rich Tomato.

name: Biofrenzy HD
summary: Biofenzy HD is a fast-paced side scrolling action game optimized for iPhone 4 retina display.

name: Bitcoin Bounce
summary: How far can you travel along the blockchain? Bounce your bitcoin along the blocks and try to land on the combo blocks to boost your score. The aim is to see how far you can get without landing on enemies or missing the blockchain and landing into oblivion!

name: Bicolor
summary: Bicolor is a beautiful and minimalist puzzle game featuring 240 handmade levels. Each of them is made of only two colors! Are you ready for this new challenge?

name: Bit Orchard: Animal Valley - Ultimate Edition
Binary
summary: Binary is a game that requires players to mix the ability to solve puzzles and effectively platform. It is about Bit, a piece of computer data, trying to find his fellow bits who got lost in a data transfer.

name: Birds of Paradise
summary:
Fresh out of college, Robin thinks she’s hit the jackpot after landing a position as assistant manager to the Birds of Paradise; an upcoming boy band with dreams of making it big. Robin is thrilled to be working with such high-profile clients… though not everything is as glamorous as it first seems.

Not only must Robin navigate her relationships with the Birds of Paradise and the Birds of Prey, but she must ensure both she and the band succeed... in life, love, and in the limelight!

name: Binary.
summary: Binary. is a cybernetic stylish action game where you fight viruses with big swords and guns. You are a freelance cracker who must dive into the net to fight the defenses and take control of the net. Use stylish swordplay and gunfire to create combos and fight off viruses in spectacular fashion.

name: Bioframe: Outpost
summary: Bioframe Outpost is a 2d sci-fi action adventure game, dedicated to exploration, experimentation, emergent gameplay, and narrative. Its unique approach to non-linear exploration and action gameplay offers a fresh take on Metroidvania gameplay.

name: BicycleSim
summary: Buy, Assemble and Ride a bicycle. Choose from a large number of Bicycle variants. Can ride the pre-built bicycles in a wide number of exotic environments and locations !!

name: Bicycle Mechanic Simulator
summary: Run your bicycle workshop and repair bicycles by your own hand. Tighten the screws, adjust the chain, and then do some personalized printing. It's not just your sweat that makes you a bicycle repair master, but your attention to detail and skills.

name: Bias
summary: Caught in the Terror of Bias." The protagonist, a film actor, has moved with his wife to a new residential area. During the moving process, his wife suddenly disappears. You enter a strange world in this residential area that began with the disappearance of his wife.

name: Bicycle Challage: Wastelands
summary: Ride your bike around the city overcoming all obstacles.

name: Bill
summary: Bill is a master in crafting, restoring, and building - Craft tools, items, and upgrades for your home - Grow your food - Take care of yourself - Make money online by shipping your creations. Help a baby alien who crashed in your garden by feeding him and building a homemade rocket.

name: Binary Syndrome
summary: The year is 2101, in a near future where the line between man and machine is fading. Through counseling, the film unravels the disease of inoperability caused by 21g, which has suddenly increased in some androids. It is a PC-98 respect command-click ADV with FM sound music and 20 color dots.

name: Birds Are Real
summary: Birds Are Real is an accurate Bird simulator with a focus on the day to day birds goal of target acquisition and vaporization.

name: Birnchen & Yoshie: Minor Confrontations
summary: Visit Birnchen and Yoshie in their playroom and fight each other for a bowl of candy in this colorful RTS! Whether it's fruity attack or stormy chaos, you choose the side!

name: Bitgun: Prelude
summary: Bitgun Prelude is an intense zombie shooter that will test your skills to the limit. With guns that break quickly and no gear to help you when you die, you'll need to be on your toes if you want to survive. Can you make it through the hordes of zombies and make it to safety?

name: Bit Orchard: Animal Valley - Extended Edition
summary: Upgrade your orchard Sell your apples to earn money and improve your orchard. Expand your land and find new secrets.

name: Bizzare
summary: Bizzare is a Yume Nikki fangame. You wander around as a strange unnamed shadow character. According to the creator, there are many ways to go, but you can't go back. There are many ways to die in the game, with some of the deaths affecting the story.

name: B.I.N.D.
summary: An overwhelming scenario volume equivalent to three light novels! The love-hate drama between a new female guard, a prisoner, and a senior guard is finally complete!

name: Biomorph
summary:
Become Your Enemy in Biomorph, a 2D Dark Metroidvania!

When you defeat a monster, the BIOMORPH mechanic allows you to take its shape and power. But beware - biomorphing has a cost as these creatures will now unlock new skills and will use them on the player upon encountering them again!

name: BirdsBorough: Town of Alchemy
summary: Build and run your own alchemy store in the ominous town of BirdsBorough...

name: Bishoujo Senshi Sailor Moon S
summary: Bishoujo Senshi Sailor Moon S is an Action game, developed by TOSE and published by Bandai, which was released in Japan in 1995. It is based upon Naoko Takeuchi's Sailor Moon shōjo manga and anime series, though its gameplay has been compared with other titles in the same genre such as SNK's Samurai Shodown. Loosely following the third season of the anime series, which adapted the third arc of the manga, the players control either one of the five original Inner Senshi or one of the three Outer Senshi as they enter a tournament to fight against each other and become the winning victor. Takeuchi supervised the production of the project and seiyūs from the anime series returned to reprise their roles.

name: BioShock
summary: The PlayStation 3 port of BioShock was released with exclusive content, including the possibility to purchase a downloadable add-on called "Challenge Rooms" and a harder difficulty level.

name: BioShock
summary: The iOS port of BioShock is a completely functional version of the original game with a graphics engine optimized for iOS devices. The mechanics are identical to the original game with all the same Plasmids, Gene Tonics and Weapons. One noteworthy function this version lacks is jumping and the Research Camera feature. The game can additionally be played with a separate Bluetooth-enabled controller.

name: BioShock 2: The Protector Trials
summary: The Protector Trials is the third DLC for BioShock 2 and the first to expand the singleplayer mode. Players step into the role of a Big Daddy who must fight off splicers while his Little Sister harvests ADAM from corpses. It offers six new maps with three difficulty levels, new unlockables and seven new achievements/trophies. There are three new weapons and Plasmid load-outs plus a fourth bonus load-out received when all previous ones are completed.

name: Bite Nite
summary: An online vampire game of biting, killing, crafting, hiding, running and searching for 2-12 players!

name: Binky Mcmxcix: The Labyrinthe
summary: Binky has found themselves inside the wondrous Labyrinthe... what treasures are to be found within its walls?

name: Bibi Blocksberg: Neustadt im Hex-Chaos
summary: Young witch Schubia Wanzhaar turns Neustadt upside down! From Aunt Mania's witch book, she tried out a very special spell that was forbidden and caused a huge chaos in the whole city. Great fun for Schubia, a nightmare for the citizens of Neustadt. And everyone thinks Bibi Blocksberg is the culprit. Now it's up to you: slip into the role of Bibi and uncover the error! To do this, you must try to undo the whole mess.

name: Bike Hop: Crazy BMX Bike Jump
Bike Banditz
summary: Bike Banditz is a horizontal scrolling shoot 'em up game developed by Hot Pulse and published by the doujin circle French Bread in August 2003 for Windows.

name: Bibi & Tina: Das große Unwetter
summary: After a devastating storm on the Martin's Farm, Bibi and Tina have to get the badly damaged farm back in shape and prepare everything for the return of the runaway horse Finja. The storm has messed things up and so the player helps the friends Bibi and Tina to collect objects lying around, repair them and bring them back to their destination.

name: Bikini Balls 2: Christmas Edition
summary: Erotic-themed Breakout clone for J2ME cellphones.

name: Bing in Wonderland
summary: Bing in Wonderland is the sequel of Wanba Warriors. it's a 2D platformer no-exploration rogue-lite game with special ink art style.

name: Bitter
summary: Play as the Sourman as you venture through the hostile jungles in this Retro-FPS Platformer!

name: Big Hops
summary: Big Hops is a fresh and froggy action-platformer focused on deep movement and emergent gameplay! Use parkour and your tongue to explore 8 huge, colorful worlds full of charming animal friends. Discover a huge range of surprising, playful interactions with gadgets and veggies!

name: Biomes: Survival Era
summary: Your last memory is a bright, glistening light in the water ... then you woke up in a world in which primates never existed and you are fighting for your life.

name: Bill's adventure: Alien war
summary: Bill's adventure: Alien war is a 2D platform game with shooting elements in which you'll fight to end an interplanetary war between robots and aliens in a futuristic world where humans have gone extinct.

name: Bio Evil
summary:
Bio Evil is a brand new and original game for the SEGA Mega Drive and Genesis. A true 16-bit, nostalgic platforming experience running on genuine SEGA hardware, that will make fans of SEGA's golden era feel warm and fuzzy.

Similar games simply do not exist on the Sega Mega Drive / Genesis. And, there aren't that many isometric games for the console, either.
Now, based on this engine, we will try to create a full-fledged game. Naturally, we will have to work hard, but I hope that we will succeed.

name: Bibi und Tina: 5 Sterne für den Martinshof
summary: Based on the popular German children’s audio play series Bibi & Tina, this game is about making Tina’s home, the horse farm called Martinshof, the best vacation place for horse-loving children. By playing mini-games you achieve your goal: renovating the farm, decorating the rooms, designing posters, planning a riding tour and more. The better your performances in these replayable mini-games are, the more points you get to earn 5 stars.

name: Bigfoot
summary: Based on a monster truck brand.

name: Biohazard RE: 2 - Z Version
summary: Biohazard RE: 2 - Z Version is the uncensored edition of the Resident Evil 2 remake exclusive to Japan. It features more graphic violence and intense gore compared to the standard Japanese version, delivering a more visceral and authentic horror experience.

name: Biohazard Village: Z Version
summary: Resident Evil Village is a first-person survival horror game and the sequel to Resident Evil 7: Biohazard. The game maintains elements from previous Resident Evil games, with players having to scavenge environments for items and manage their resources. However, it adds more action-oriented gameplay, with higher enemy counts and a greater emphasis on combat.

name: Biohazard RE: 2 - Z Version: Deluxe Edition
BipBop
summary: Bipbop is a a breakout clone with a sinister twist.

name: BipBop III
summary: The ending to the Bipbop trilogy. It concludes the thrilling story.

name: Bitejacker
summary: Bitejacker is a zombie shooter based on the indie game review show, Bytejacker. Player can play as the host, Anthony Carboni, or cameraman, Jon Rivera as they brave through a bizarre world of zombie apocalypse.

name: Big Adventure: Trip to Europe 2 - Collector's Edition
summary:
The Collector's Edition includes:
8 extra locations with even more things to find!
8 more mini-games to solve!
Downloadable wallpapers and soundtrack to revisit Europe whenever!
Add exclusive postage stamps to your album!

name: Bill Hates Videogames
summary: A comedic misadventure game about a jerk named Bill who gets sucked into a videogame. Eat trash, solve things and fart at anytime. Also it's supposed to be funny, but I don't guarantee that.

name: Billion Bastard Bots
summary: Intense first-person bullet-hell arena-shooter in a fully randomised city-scape.

name: Billiard: Classic 8 Ball Pool
summary: In our billiards you can play both with a virtual opponent and with friends on one device! Challenge a friend to a duel and compete with him in skill, dexterity and accuracy, because only these skills will help you achieve victory! The rules of the game …

name: Big Adventure: Trip to Europe 2
summary: Prepare for a journey through 30 amazing tourist spots around Europe! Hunt for hidden objects and solve brain-teasing mini-games as you visit the Paleontological Museum in Paris, see the Pena Palace in Portugal, enjoy a walk in Bruges, and even ride the tram in Lisbon!

name: Bite Me
summary: Bite Me is an RPG. It is playable alone or online; it is composed of a Twitch integration. Improve your skills as well as your weapons and enter the legend by fighting, monsters, spectators, broadcasters, or other players!

name: Big Buck Hunter Pro
summary:
Big Buck Hunter Pro is a deluxe hunting TV game based off the arcade game of the same name by Play Mechanix. Released in 2009 by Jakks Pacific and delovped by SuperHappyFunFun. A two player version was also released with the controllers green and orange.

In 2011, The TV game was discontinued afterwards and a sequel was released called Big Buck Safari.

In 2012 it was sold again only from April 2th to December 24th.

The game is just a Big Buck Hunter Pro arcade port where you just shoot down bucks and not the does. You play either 1 trek or 3 treks hunting adventure. There's also minigames you play at the end of your hunting adventure.

name: Big Buck Safari
summary: Big Buck Safari is Plug It In & Play TV Hunting video game based off the Play Mechenix arcade game released by Jakks Pacific in 2011 two years after the Big Buck Hunter Pro TV game.

name: Bid Whist: Card Game
summary: Bidding and predicting wins are what make playing Bid Whist fun and exciting, whether you win or lose.

name: Bitter Silver
summary: A choose-your-own-adventure, space western visual novel. Play as a bounty hunter leading a team of bickering misfits as you track down targets with your words or your weapons in a reactive story where your choices matter.

name: Big Adventure: Trip to Europe 3 - Collector's Edition
summary: Visit 9 European countries and search for interesting items in unforgettable old European towns and play a bunch of new mini games.

name: Bike Rider DX3: Time Rider
summary: Bike Rider DX3: Time Rider is a single-button platforming game, released only in Japan via the Nintendo 3DS eShop in 2014.

name: Biyoushi Debut Monogatari: Top Sutairisuto wo Mezasou!
summary: Become a coveted beautician and have a hands-on experience!

name: Bibi Blocksberg: Das große Hexenbesen-Rennen 2
summary: The new Big Broom Race is characterized by completely revised and significantly improved graphics, which clearly surpass its predecessor and thus ensures even more identification with Bibi's adventures. This time, the players are drawn to three worlds that fans of the little witch have already learned to love in the animated series: to Transylvania, to the Orient and to the dinosaurs. There is something for every taste here. Each of the 12 racetracks is characterized by special features that affect gameplay. From simple shortcuts, jumps and obstacles to spontaneous route changes during the race, everything is included. The airfield has increased to eight characters and also comes up with eight witches' brooms that can be freely combined with each other. There are also eight completely renewed hex potions that provide excitement and invite you to play tactical games.

name: Biraku Emblem
summary: Biraku Emblem poses the question: “What if Nina married Marth instead of Hardin?” With that premise, the story of Book 2 is told with Biraku as the main protagonist. Book 1 is the more advanced hack, with several fully custom maps included and those pre-existing maps largely rearranged in some way to provide a new experience while playing them.

name: Bitter Belief
summary: Bitter Belief is an metroidvania game that with a very engaging story provides adventure and drama. Face monsters and different challenges as you travel through unknown lands in search of the magic eyes of stone to bring your exorcist father back to life, after having a contact with his spirit.

name: Bit Orchard: Animal Valley - Halloween Edition
summary: Explore the cave to the north of the orchard. There you will find various Halloween-themed items that you can take and decorate your orchard with them.

name: Big Kids & Toddlers Educational Learning Games Collection Bundle 5-in-1
summary: Game collection with the TOP FIVE most popular McPeppergames educational games for children and toddlers! All games can be played without language skills.

name: Big XXL Kids Games Collection Bundle 11-in-1 Educational Children Learning Fun
summary: XXL Kids games collection with ELEVEN popular McPeppergames educational children & toddler games! Each game can be played without any language skills.

name: Birdie Shot
summary: Birdie Shot is a casual golf game where you can create your own golf team and compete with other players on golf courses around the world. Build a team of 8 characters and compete against other players in casual PVP golf matches. Upgrade your characters, equip them skills and items to gain the upper hand and make profit. You can earn the in–game currency 'Gold' by winning against other golfers in multiplayer matches, which you can exchange for BIRDIE Tokens and BORA crypto tokens. Meet and play fiercely with masters from all over the world. Collect rewards and make money!

name: BinaryDefense
summary: BinaryDefense sets you back to a tactical and classical Tower Defense game with a touch of modernity! Establish a powerful defense grid over a complete mission path in order to face numerous waves of binary-invaders.

name: Bizarr Adventure
summary: Strange Adventure is a classic pixel adventure game. The classic Adventure Island gameplay is reproduced, rich and interesting level scenes, various traps and mechanisms are reproduced, bringing new exciting adventures.

name: Big's Big World
summary: Oh no! Where did Froggy go this time? He's lost somewhere out in the big world. Play as Big the Cat and help reunite him with his pollywog pal in this open-world adventure.

name: Big Farm Story: Shiver Night Pack
summary: When witches go riding and pumpkins gleam, the moon laughs and whispers, ‘tis near Halloween! Enjoy our new Halloween DLC that brings you an exclusive pet as well as furniture, decoration pieces and building skins to spookify your farm.

name: Big Farm Story: Pet Paradise Pack
summary: Home is where your pet is happy! Enjoy new furniture and decoration pieces and transform your farm into a Pet Paradise.

name: Big Farm Story: Asian Package
summary: This is additional content for Big Farm Story, but does not include the base game.

name: Big Farm Story: Peaceful Nature Pack
summary: There is no better designer than nature! Enjoy our new nature DLC that brings you the most beautiful furniture and decoration pieces as well as skins for your farm buildings.

name: Bishoujo Senshi Sailor Moon Super S: Illustration Club
summary: On this game cartridge you can attempt to draw various Sailor Moon characters and be judged on your drawing skills. In addition, this software also contains a horoscope-like game where you can input your birthday in for a fortune. Interestingly Bandai released a new design of the Design Master called the Paluseata (パルシータ) marketed towards girls along with this title. This package is unique in that it doesn’t allow addon carts to be mounted to it, unlike other cartridges for the system.

name: Biohazard Village: Z Version - Gold Edition
Bittersweet Starlight
summary: Sorrel has a conversation with his good friend Aster at the place they always meet. What will they talk about?

name: Birushana Senki: Ichijuu no Kaze
summary: This is a fandisc for Birushana Senki, this includes “sweet” after stories that takes place after the best ending of each main route as well as giving routes to the sub-characters.

name: Bigger Guns: Expansion Pack
summary: Bigger Guns Just Got Bigger!

name: B.I.G
summary: This game is based on puzzle strategy game where only player has less actions but a lot levels to move on.

name: Bio Prototype
summary: A wave of irrational experimentation rushes towards you. Hurry up and mutate! evolution! Become scarier monsters than them! Use flesh and blood to bloom a way of survival!

name: Birdcage
summary: Shoot, Slash and Weave through bullets and enemies in this story-driven arcade shooter. Two giant fleets converge over the surface of the Earth. Pilot the HALCYON to prevent all-out war and the destruction of your Home. What is the value of a bullet when you wield a Sword?

name: Big Kids Games Collection Bundle
summary: This children's games learning pack contains 6 fantastic children's games!

name: Big Buck Hunter Arcade: Elk Adventure Pack
summary: Elk Adventure pack will include an all new bonus adventure hunting area featuring an additional 3 treks and 5 sites where you’ll have an opportunity to shoot a variety of Bulls, don’t shot the cows!

name: Bit Orchard: Animal Valley - Special Edition
Bit Hotel
summary: Bit Hotel is a social-first pixel-art gaming metaverse, in which users can hang out, compete for leaderboard rewards and earn income. All in-game items (NFTs), such as characters, rooms and furniture, have been integrated on a blockchain and all have their own unique perks.

name: BiriBiriBeat
summary: BiriBiriBeat is a miniature rhythm game experience in a microscopic 28KB package! Join your robotic guide Navi and groove together to square wave sounds as you tap your way to the top of the scoreboard!

name: Birdie Bartender
summary: Help Birdie the bartender work her shifts so she can take a nice vacation!

name: Bitmates
summary: Welcome to the world of Bitmates. A massively multiplayer online role-playing game where monkeys rule the lands. Explore, gather resources, and interact with other players in this vastly diverse world.

name: Bilmo
summary: Bilmo is simple 3D arcade-like game, where you have to get over different obstacles and most importantly get the highest score you can!

name: Birdwatcher
summary: Play as an aspiring cryptozoologist as you scour the scenic Mount Pallas National Park for definitive proof that the creature of local legend is more than just a myth.

name: Bittersweet Dream
summary: A Yume Nikki-inspired fangame. You play as Lizzie and explore their dream world.

name: Bill the Demon
summary: Side-scrolling platformer starring a demon who eats human souls and screams to destroy walls.

name: Bird Shooter
summary: Shoot birds, earn money and advance to next level.

name: Biters
summary: A pixel side-scrolling shooter against zombies.

name: Bill Bounce
summary: Bill Bounce was an Adobe Flash game published by Nintendo to promote the release of Mario Party Advance on the Game Boy Advance.

name: Bingo Wackadoo Watch
summary: Let’s play with Bluey, Bingo and the Wackadoo Watch! Cute wristwatch featuring Bingo includes eight digital clock faces, time tools and four games. Bluey and Bingo will guide you through games that include characters from the show. Bandit has wound Bingo up like a wind-up toy! Press the left and right buttons to help Bingo avoid obstacles that appear in the classroom. Bluey wants to play a game of keepy-uppy! At Hammerbarn, Bluey wants to buy the same thing as Bingo, or help Bluey keep a balloon off the ground by using the left and right buttons! Time tools include a stopwatch, timer and alarm. Wackadoo!

name: Big Head: Guess Words & Head Charades
summary:
Big Head! is an amazingly fast, fun and exciting multiplayer game for you and your best friends / family / colleagues!
Try to guess the word on the card that’s on your head based on your friends clues before the timer runs out and your head explodes :)

name: Bivoj
summary: Originally designed 2D and 2.5D mobile game. As Bivoj, you must save the beautiful Kazi from the bloodthirsty pigs. A difficult journey full of various tasks and traps inspired by an old legend. Will you accept this request? :)

name: Bible Trivia Mania
summary:
Do You Know God's Word? Test Yourself, And Grow!
Be challenged by witty and engaging questions. Complete quizzes in Missing Word, True or False and Multiple Choice modes. Take TESTS and EXAMS...as often as you want.

name: Biomes O' Plenty
summary: Biomes O' Plenty is an expansive biome mod for Minecraft that adds a slew of new, unique biomes to the Overworld and Nether! To go along with the new biomes, it adds new plants, flowers, trees, building blocks, and much more!

name: Bit Orchard: Animal Valley - Complete Edition
summary: Pull out weeds, plant new apple trees and gather the fruits of your labor. This bundle includes various Halloween-themed items and the Chicken House.

name: Bike Trials Junkyard 2
summary: Since you like the first one we are now giving you the second part of the game, Bike Trials Junkyard 2! With 20 new challenging stages, drive and balance your bike in the rough terrain of the junkyard. It's never going to be a smooth ride in this game. So better put on your helmet because it's going to be a bumpy ride...

name: Bit Orchard: Animal Valley - Premium Edition
Big Nose and the Witchdoctor
summary: Follow Big Nose the Caveman in his new adventure to defeat the Witchdoctor!

name: Biblios Dice
summary: Biblios Dice is a digital adaptation of the dice game by Dr. Finn. In it you are working as medieval monks to produce illustrations and improve the prestige of your abbey. Manipulate the value of the five different resources, buy and sell at the market, and gain the bishop's favor.

name: Bishoujo Senshi Sailor V
summary: Bishoujo Senshi Sailor V is an Action game, developed and published by DK Software, which was released in Japan in 1994.

name: Bicycle Tour
summary:
Swipe to cycling through the beautiful sightseeing in France. Dive in the countryside melodies while dashing out all your opponents!!!
Reaching the cross line is one thing, you are expected to show your timing skill to crush other bicycles on the way.

name: Bike Racing
summary: Short flash based bike racing simple 2D sidescroller game.

name: Bio-Synthetica
summary: Take on the role of R3-M1, a newly activated robot, as they venture through a dark, dystopian world in search of answers. The clues lay buried within dust and ash, data files and audio clips left behind by decaying corpses from a not-so-distant past.

name: Birger's Tale
summary: Take on the role of a fierce Viking warrior on a quest to defeat enemies, conquer new lands, and earn glory in battle. Master the art of side-scrolling combat as you hack and slash your way through hordes of enemies using a variety of weapons and special abilities.

name: Big Survivor
summary: Survive, with a smile on your face! Fight your way through the scribbles, as you power up and become stronger. Vibe with the tornadoes and get a useless pet. Increase your sucking and suck away!!!!!!?

name: Big Boss: A Villain Simulator
summary: An asymmetrical roguelite experience where the player is the boss, fighting heroes for rank in EVILLC to become the final boss. Equip spells, lay traps, and take command of minions to ensure your rise to the top!

name: Big Butt Bobby
summary: Big Butt Bobby is a 2D platform game set in a grotesque fantasy world.

name: Bike Arena
summary: Welcome to the arena of 2 wheelers. Only true enthusiasts will cross the threshold here.

name: Bionic Slammer
summary: Bionic Slammer is a metroidvania with a hand-drawn microscopic world, and a gameplay inspired by 2D games from the 90s. Travel through the different levels with your katana, fight nanobots and bacterias, and save the Body from destruction.

name: Bingo Girl
summary: Bingo Girl is a puzzle filling game. The numbers of calling numbers are randomly selected within 1-75. Players can quickly find these numbers on the card and make marks according to the calling numbers. As long as the marked number complies with the award rules, win.

name: Bit Oz: Wonder Crusher
summary: Aim, Shoot, Wall of Worlds.Bit Oz Wonder Crusher is a deck-building action shooting game with roguelike elements. Experience the fun of aiming and shooting!

name: Big Adventure: Trip to Europe
summary: This is the biggest trip in Europe, where you will visit 10 countries and 24 cities.

name: Biniku no Kaori: Bangai Hen
summary: Contains two extra stories - "Ritsuko's sigh" and "Yuki's scent" to Biniku no Kaori.

name: Birthday Kid
summary:
It's your birthday! You should go greet your guests.

You're Pepper, the eponymous birthday kid. It's your 12th birthday today and you're having a party! The cake is nice, but you don't really like your guests that much... Also, there seems to be something important you're forgetting... and where the heck are your parents?

Birthday Kid is a fairly short game about celebrating your birthday, human sacrifice, and discovering yourself.

It's mostly story focused with a few puzzles. Playtime is about an hour or two.

Warning: this game contains violence and disturbing content!

name: Bit.Trip Collection
summary: Venture with CommanderVideo on incredible journey through 8-bit classics! Experience various game modes and controlls inspired by retro arcade games, and win each level with epic beat in the background! Now in a 6-in-1 bundle!

name: Bingo Bay
summary:
Now people all around the world can enjoy the fun of Bingo!
Enjoy a game of Bingo on the go. Anytime and anywhere.

name: Birds In Paradise
summary: Love bird games or block puzzle matching game? Introducing an incredibly addictive puzzle block matching game where you match three or more birds of same color to crush them from the block. Birds in Paradise includes very cute and amazing game graphics so you will fall in love with the game play while playing with birds in this birds paradise game. Play this game with cute birds of different colors. This birds paradise game also includes different themed obstacles while playing. You come across different explosions in the birds block puzzle match game.

name: Biohazard Village: Z Version - Winters' Expansion
Bitter-Sweet Cohabitation
summary: The hero is looking for someone to be by his side, and the heroines are looking for a place to stay. Their circumstances become clear, but what will he choose…?

name: Billund
summary: Billund is a new Minecraft mod by dan200, the creator of ComputerCraft, created in 48 hours for the Modjam mod making competition. It brings a fictional brand of toy plastic bricks to the game, that you might find familiar if you've ever played with LEGO.

name: Bird Jump!
summary:
Our birds with lovely tiny wings always hope to fly up high, but the problem is the gravity.
Please help your bird to jump up high while avoiding obstacles!!

name: Birds and Blocks 2
summary: The Birds are back with 120 new levels!

name: Bitsy
summary: Bitsy is a 3D stealth puzzle game where you play as a mechanized spider completing contracts in a futuristic world. Climb walls, leap and web sling around tough obstacles, and above all: avoid detection.

name: Binarion
summary: Improve your intellect with this unique puzzle game where you solve delta grid to find two binary prime factors from a given multiplication product.

name: Bit Orchard: Animal Valley - Platinum Edition
summary: This bundle includes various Halloween-themed items and 5 mini games.

name: Biorganic
summary: Biorganic is a top-down arena survival roguelike game. You have to survive with your towers! Choose your tower and go to the battle! Upgrade your skills, buy more towers, create unique builds, and survive until the end!

name: Birdie Wing: Golf Girls' Story
summary: Let's experience the exciting golf in the world of Birdie Wing!

name: Bigfoot vs. Scots
summary: Get ready to experience cryptids, the arcane and a murder mystery with your Bigfoot companion on the isle of Amadan! Using a mix of magic, and an arsenal of weaponry, level up your skill tree. As you and your team mates quest through this open world mystery adventure and earn many many many Haggis.

name: Bish Bash Bots
summary: Bish Bash Bots is a unique mix of casual tower defense strategy and all-out brawling action. Team up in couch co-op / online play or go it alone and fight to save the world by building upgradable turrets, unlocking gadgets and bashing bots with giant hammers.

name: Bitter Heaven
summary: Survive intense bullet-hell bosses. Shoot enemies in the face. Discover the worlds many secrets. Break things with a giant---spoon?

name: Bikeout
summary: Take a bike and go on extreme tracks Bikeout! Here you have to grow from a noob to a freeride legend.

name: Big Adventure: Trip to Europe 4 - Collector's Edition
summary: Avi Games presents the newest game in the Big Adventure series with Big Adventure: Trip to Europe 4! Packed with challenging hidden-object scenes and clever mini-games, this European holiday offers a vacation experience like no other!

name: Big Fat Battle
summary: Team up for a battle of epic proportions in this fast paced PvP third-person shooter. A host of ridiculous characters, outrageous weapons and potent powerups await you and your friends.

name: Billy-Bob
summary:
Billy Bob is the fortieth game of the NES version of Action 52.

In the game player control Billy Bob. The goal of the game is to complete levels by dodging arrows, jumping over pits and climbing ledges. In the game, you can shoot by pressing the A button. Climbing the ledges, the player needs to guess the moment, as spears and bricks randomly fall from the ceiling.

name: Bits and Pieces
summary: A game featured in Action 52.

name: Birds no More
summary: No place to relax? No silence in the air? Fidgeting birdies surround? Prove yourself handy-smash noisy birdies! Bright and childish, simple and fun. Easy game for a minute at ease. Have a minute-go for birdies!

name: Bird Sort: Color Puzzle
summary: Bird Sort - Color Puzzle - Sorting puzzle game with a unique art style, a collection of colorful birds.

name: Bird's Eye Odyssey
summary: Take to the skies and explore a lush world in Bird's Eye Odyssey, a captivating 3D adventure game. Play as a bird protagonist on a quest to uncover the truth about his banishment, and complete tasks like collecting rings, driving a tank, and discovering hidden objects.

name: Bike Dash
summary:
Feel the rush as you ride your bike across hazardous trails avoiding obstacles while performing gravity defying tricks to reach the farthest you can.
The game combines authentic mountain bike downhill action with an extreme endless runner.
Earn extra coins by performing tricks and combos in huge jumps .
Level up to unlock more insane tricks and upgrade your gear.

name: Biki Biki Flip
summary: Biki Biki Flip - The Ultimate Jumping Adventure!

name: Bit Orchard: Animal Valley - Director's Cut
summary: Pull out weeds, plant new apple trees and gather the literal fruits of your labour. With time, you'll discover ways to make your life easier and explore this charming 2D world.

name: Binary Monsters III: School Fighter
summary: Binary Monsters III - School Fighter (熱門高校 數碼怪獸III) is a Game Boy Color title published by Gowin, and released in 2001. It is the third game in the Binary Monsters series, and Gowin's 5th GBC-released game.

name: Bio Hazard
summary: Bio Hazard (also called 生化危机 or "Resident Evil" in Chinese) is a Famicom bootleg game made by Waixing in 2003 based on Resident Evil for the PlayStation. The plot follows the original game scripts, although just Jill is a playable character and the game is in Chinese.

name: Binary Pot
summary: Connection with a famous network game "a world", delicious coffee, and network cafe Binary Pot with a famous girl. As a young chief of the shop, a hero will experience various tales with a regular customer etc. Since girls are the players of a network game, respectively, after closing can also meet them on on-line. And the tale which becomes entangled in both of the worlds, the tale which is not involved. Is a hero how to make it put the body on which world?

name: Biscuitts 5
summary: Biscuitts 5 is a First Person Shooter game.

name: Bifröst: Through the Realms
summary: Bifröst: Through the Realms is a fast-paced multidimensional platformer with Norse and Sci-Fi themes. Use the power of the Bifröst to save the realms from Ragnarök.

name: Bike Offroad Simulator
summary: The Bike Offroad Simulator is a racing-simulation game that puts you to the test again.

name: Bionicle: The Game
summary:
The GBA Port of "Bionicle".

Released as the handheld companion to the 3D BIONICLE, this game obviously has different gameplay, such as the lack of a save feature, using passwords instead, and a limited number of lives, after which the game resets. An improvement is that all versions of the Toa, including Toa, Toa Nuva, and Takanuva, are playable. Some basic story elements are kept the same, however.

name: Big Mutha Truckers
summary: Game Boy Advance port of Big Mutha Truckers.

name: Big Mutha Truckers
summary: Nintendo DS port of Big Mutha Truckers.

name: Bionicle Heroes
summary:
The PS2/Gamecube Port of "Bionicle Heroes".

Bionicle Heroes is a third-person action game where the player takes on the role of the various Lego Bionicle Toa Inika - Jaller, Matoro, Hahli, Kongu, Hewkii, and Nuparu. These heroes wear Toa Masks of Power - power-ups that can be found throughout the levels to gain different elemental based abilities. There are also Bionicle canisters to aid the protagonists on their quest to defeat Vezon - the 7th Piraka who had stolen the Mask of Life.

The gameplay centers around firefights against the alien "robots" called Vahki, Visorak, and Bohrok. Players will collect Lego pieces for every enemy they defeat, and eventually enable an invulnerable Hero Mode to help defeat the Toa's enemies.

name: Bionicle Heroes
summary:
The Wii Port of "Bionicle Heroes".

Bionicle Heroes is an action-shooter where the player takes on the role of the various Lego Bionicle Toa Inika - Jaller, Matoro, Hahli, Kongu, Hewkii, and Nuparu. These heroes wear Toa Masks of Power - powerups you can find throughout the levels to gain different elemental based abilities. You'll also find Bionicle cannisters to help aid your quest to defeat Vezon - the 7th Piraka who had stolen the Mask of Life. Gameplay centers around firefights against the alien "robots" called Vahki, Visorak and Borhok. Players will collect Lego pieces for every enemy you defeat, and eventually enable an invulnerable Hero Mode to help defeat the Toa's enemies.

name: Bionicle Heroes
summary:
J2ME release of "Bionicle Heroes".

The mobile version of BIONICLE Heroes is much simpler than versions for other consoles. The player plays as a character who can change shape. Initially, the character is in the shape of Hahli, but collecting masks of Jaller, Hewkii, and Matoro allows the player to transform into them. The enemies in this game are Rahi that resemble Ussal crabs. The player travels through various areas through means of teleportation, collecting various items and power-ups, and defeating enemies. Teleportation pads are activated by using points earned.

name: Birmingham's Ghosts: Fear and Loathing
summary: Birmingham's Ghosts: Fear and Loathing Absolutely free and intriguing game in the style of "I find". At Birmingham Palace has never been so scary and dangerous. Find Birmingham Ghosts to the city was quiet. Search for objects in colorful exotic locations.

name: Bikes and Girls
summary: This game is a classic puzzle game with several levels of difficulty and beautiful arts.

name: Billie Eternal and the Jetcats in... Escape from the Black Hole!
summary: ​Billie Eternal and the Jetcats in... Escape from the Black Hole! is a rock 'n' roll space adventure video game/album from Sydney surf rock band Billie Eternal. A platform and shoot-em-up surf/skate/spaceship adventure with nods to the classics!

name: Bit the Apple, So What?
summary: A short musical theater play set in dystopian Eastern Europe, based on a biblical story.

name: Binding of Elements
summary: In this action-rougelike game you'll have to survive waves of monsters and fight against bosses. You'll be able to combine different elements to get unique abilities and arm yourself against the challenges. Choose from a variety of upgrades and improve your character or abilities.

name: Birds Aren’t Real
summary: As a government surveillance pigeon drone, you'll engage in missions, sneak around the city, and use your creative thinking to manipulate the townsfolk and dispel their suspicions about your totally not-real Avian Task Force.

name: Bit Orchard: Animal Valley - GOTY Edition
summary: Pull out weeds, plant new apple trees and gather the literal fruits of your labour. With time, you'll discover ways to make your life easier and explore this charming 2D world.

name: Bimbo
summary: A scrolling maze in which the goals of Bimbo is to eat ten carrots and run from black rabbits.

name: Big Sword Hero
summary: A platform fighting game with 4-player local, a party game that guarantees the mix between fun and epic battles with tense disputes. Simple mechanics and with varied maps and modes, each dispute is always unique.

name: Bio Inc. Nemesis
summary: Bio Inc. Nemesis is a free-to-play real-time strategy simulator where you assemble a team of doctors and inflict lethal diseases on hapless patients. Assume control of your very own hospital and recruit doctors from many different medical fields, including modern medicine, alternative treatments, and spiritual healing. Manipulate a patient’s lifestyle and develop risk factors to make them more vulnerable to infection. Terminate the patient before an opposing team of doctors find cures and vaccines to save them!

name: Bishook.
summary: Bishook is a unique strategy board game that blends Chess and an in-a-row game for twice the fun.

name: Bikmin 269
summary: A Rom hack of Pikmin 2, featuring new areas, enemies, treasure and much more

name: Binary Rush
summary:
Binary Rush is a simple but challenging game that will mess with your head and test your reflexes!
Tap left and right to control both dots in their endlessly scrolling virtual world while avoiding obstacles.

name: Bird Brawl
summary:
The avian love-child of Angry Birds and Smash Brothers, Bird Brawl follows the flight pattern of other fast-paced multiplayer fighting games.

Using lasers, waterballoons, eggs and more, up to four players can ruffle each others feathers in a battle-royale to see who can first reach enough points to advance to the next level in this shooting game.

Explore the cartoony world of Bok's Barnyard, soaring through skies, trees, and underground passageways using WASD controls and your mouse to aim and shoot.

This flash-based arcade game is playable right out of your browser, lets you battle your buddies by sharing a link, or brawl with other anonymous players online without any registration or download. Select your favorite bird--a free-flying hummingbird, or a chicken "tank"--and try to get first place in the pecking order!

name: Bite Size Terrors: Erobos Heaven
summary: Unsettling & Disturbing Events Quickly Rise After Being Saved By God.

name: Bit Bike
summary: Mostly black and white minimalist graphics. You are a self-controlled bicycle that needs to climb difficult obstacles using your skills. Find your way to freedom.

name: Biomech Hell
summary: A run and gun that mixes old-school mechanics from games like Contra, Gunstar Heroes and Metal Slug; with more modern features and a large dose of violence. A total arcade experience for all lovers of retro gaming!

name: Bit Generations: Dialhex
summary: bit Generations: Dialhex is a Game Boy Advance video game released in 2006 by Nintendo and skip, Ltd. The game was part of the initial batch of bit Generations games.

name: Bichos & Cia
summary: Bichos & Cia is a bundle that includes five games released by Ciberne Software.

name: Bird Climb
summary:
Bird Climb is a simple one touch Multiplayer Arcade game that is impossible to put down. Challenge your friends to play this fun & addictive game and beat their score.

Tap to fly your Bird to the top and avoid the spikes. The faster you tap, the quicker the bird flies. Collect precious gems on your way to unlock fantastic new characters!

You can invite and play with all your friends in online Multiplayer mode and have multiple battles and challenges open at the same time. Play to compete and win a place at the top of your Friends & Global Ranks. How fast are your reaction skills? This fun and fast paced arcade game will test you to the max.

name: Bitcoin Man Clicker
summary: A clicker game with the goal to click on as many bitcoins as possible before running out of lives.

name: Biohazard Village: Cloud Z Version
summary: Resident Evil Village is a first-person survival horror game and the sequel to Resident Evil 7: Biohazard. The game maintains elements from previous Resident Evil games, with players having to scavenge environments for items and manage their resources. However, it adds more action-oriented gameplay, with higher enemy counts and a greater emphasis on combat.

name: Biplane Baron 2: Flying Ace
summary: How does it feel to be a biplane fighter pilot on Worl War I. Try to survive the onslaught, stay focus and embrace yourself to conquer the enemy in order to earn badges of appreciation and admiration from your colleagues. Why don't you try?

name: Big2Small
summary:
Big2Small is a new puzzle adventure game where you try and guide the animals to their corresponding food of choice.

Travel through forests, farmland, sewers, and more to help Elle the elephant, Gisele the goat, and Melanie the mouse find delicious food in 40 unique puzzles. Use each animal's different abilities together to manipulate and maneuver past rivers, mouse holes, giant pipes, shrubs, mousetraps, and other obstacles.

name: Bit Orchard: Animal Valley - Happy Edition
Bitcoin Escape
summary:
How long can you survive in this digital escape game? You need to have superpowers to do well in this game, because you cannot tell if you are going down a dead end until it’s too late.
Mt Gox has been hacked and now Bitcoins have been scattered across the digital landscape. To contain the extent of the breach, the authorities are quickly moving to turn off mining servers and lock accounts, destroying millions of Bitcoin in the process. It is up to you to gather as much of the loose Bitcoin that you can before it is destroyed, but be warned, the path is full of perilous traps awaiting just one mis-calculation on your part. The future of Bitcoin (and your own personal fortune) is in your hands.

name: Bindmancer
summary: Explore a randomized dungeon filled with NSFW perils to escape, traps to trip, prisoners to free, and evil-doers to defeat and punish! All in the quest to free your friends from deviously kinky fates!

name: Bid War: Auction Simulator Storage Hunter
summary: Welcome to the world of auctions, where every lot hides secrets and unexpected surprises! Are you ready to take a risk? Become a true professional, as the competition can be ruthless. Feel the adrenaline of battling for the most valuable and rare items, and become the king of auctions!

name: Bichito Clicker
summary: Clicker / Idle style game where you must use your skills and abilities by tapping The Bichos on your mobile screen to defeat them and thus obtain points to improve yourself and face other stronger Bichos.

name: Birds & Bombs
summary: Wicked ghosts have kidnapped the president’s daughter, trapping her in a haunted mansion! As a plucky young bird trooper you must use your bomb-throwing abilities to defeat the ghosts and rescue the girl. Ghosts can only be destroyed by throwing bombs into their mouths. Use the stylus to set your throwing angle and take your best shot! Bounce bombs off walls and eerie floating furniture to defeat all the spooks in each stage, but make sure not to run out of bombs or you're in for a fright! In addition to the main Story Mode, you can really put your skills to the test in Challenge Mode with only a limited number of bombs to last you through to the end. But never fear; with perseverance and accuracy, you're sure to replenish your supply and stay in high spirits!

name: Biomes
summary: A massively-multiplay world where players work together to build, farm, fish, and solve puzzles to fight back against the infectious Muck.

name: Bike Trials Offroad 2
summary: We know that you're going to ask for another one so here we are again for another part of Bike Trials: Offroad! If you ain't challenged on the first one, this second part is going to blow your mind! From crates, rocks, logs and other crazy platforms plus plenty of mine bombs! It's going to be an explosive drive that will make your adrenaline pumping!

name: Billy in Bubble Trouble
summary: Billy is a Florbz and the favourite pet of Space Princess Leila. He is a happy little critter as he gets snacks regularly and the occasional tummy rub to ensure he feels like he is in Paradise. But one day he woke up and his food bowl was empty.... no snacks.... and no tummy rubbing anymore! Why?

name: Bike Unchained
summary: Download now and shred sweet trails, including tracks from the world’s premier freeride event Red Bull Rampage! Get the coolest bikes, travel the world and build your crew to ride against your ultimate rival - Team Praedor - and battle for a top spot on the podium.

name: Bionic Momentum
summary: A hardcore old school 2D physics-based sci-fi action puzzle platformer, with an emphasis on retaining speed and momentum

name: BitterSweet Detectives' Tea Party
summary: Bittersweet -Detectives' Tea Party- is an adventure-mystery visual novel game, tracking down the cases left by a mysterious phantom thief named “Beneatha”. It is a tale about seeking the truth, with a bitter and sweet journey.

name: Bird And Words: Find Word
summary: Embark on a captivating word-filled adventure with "Bird and Words: Find Word," a casual and strategic word game that will test your reflexes and vocabulary skills! Get ready to guide our charming bird through a perilous journey filled with words, spikes, and exciting challenges.

name: Bike Rivals
summary:
Are you ready to play the greatest motocross game ever?
Bike Rivals is a new and exciting physics based motocross game from Miniclip!
Be the most intense, competitive and quickest rider in order to get the 3 stars on all the levels, while enjoying the amazing bike physics and fast-paced gameplay! But this isn’t just about finishing each level...it’s about getting the fastest time! Try your best to beat the clock!

name: Big Burger
summary: A homebrew game for Nintendo 64 in which the player stacks up ingredients of hamburguers.

name: Bit Heroes Quest
summary:
Bit Heroes Quest: Pixel RPG captures that charm and nostalgia of your favorite RPG games!

Explore and battle your way through a vast open world inspired by your favorite 8-bit & 16-bit dungeon heroes and monsters.

name: Bit Reverse
summary: A puzzle game with a robot that switches state of an object.

name: Bird Watch: Central Park
summary: Bird Watch Central Park is an Ornithology Simulator where you traverse New York City's central park in search of various bird species to fill your log. Take in the breathtaking scenery of Central Park and keep your eyes peeled for various bird species as you fully immerse yourself in Bird Watching.

name: Bit Orchard: Animal Valley - Amazing Edition
BioCrisis
summary: BioCrisis is a Resident Evil-inspired classic survival horror with PS1 style pre-rendered graphics and tank controls.

name: Biotech is Godzilla
summary:
Forests of concrete and steel, breathing and flowing forever under the wide eye of the sun, now ruled the works of man.
