His own eyes watch as hummingbirds swarm their branches and feed from whirring flowers. Long since had a creature like him been to this place, and standing in the midst of this weird marriage of nature and machine, he felt himself an intruder. What happened here, to create this new earth? And what became of those responsible for this ironclad garden of earthly delights?

Before he can finish the thought, the marine's spell is broken by a thundering roar.

Seems not all of man's gifts were of good intention...

Biotech is Godzilla is the 22nd limit-removing project from the nature-loving, tree-hugging hippies in the Doomer Boards Kommune. Led by glenzinho, it features eight maps of intense scenic action pretty enough to paint a picture that will have you itching to get out your gardening overalls after it's all said and done.

name: Bird Ball
summary: You scream out and all your friends rush to their computers to fire up the next big thing in online multiplayer video game entertainment. Play with friends or alone and spawn in some friendly bird compatriots to play with or against. The aim is to score goals and have fun in the sandbox.

name: Bilattice
summary: Bilattice is a massive puzzle game featuring over 300 hand-crafted levels and tons of unique mechanics. The mechanics interact with each other in endlessly interesting ways to produce hours of mind-bending content. The sheer number of clever gimmicks offered by this game is hard not to appreciate.

name: Biotopia
summary: A slow-paced and relaxing game where you build beautiful, diverse landscapes, and create suitable habitats for any animals you attract along the way.

name: Bite Size Terrors: Speechless
summary: Find what was taken from you at any cost in this Minimalistic Survival Horror.

name: Bite Size Terrors: Reverse Blue
summary: The Bright Blue Sky... Is Hiding Something.

name: Biohazard: Escape Room
summary: The world is being ravaged by a viral pandemic. In this escape room, you will assume the role of an investigative journalist determined to uncover the origin of the outbreak. To achieve this, you will explore an animal research facility, find clues, and solve puzzles through immersive environments.

name: BioFusion
summary: BioFusion is a co-op multiplayer, PvE, first-person-shooter, tower defense game. Swing on a grappling hook, ride a hovercraft, throw grenades, collect buffs, build towers and traps. Do what you must to keep the mutants from the Spores of Evolution.

name: Bite Size Terrors: GuyGuy Toys
summary: Welcome to GUYGUY Toys! As the new Employee, I hope you..you..you.. Learn How to Deliver Toys Happily!

name: Bingo: Pet Rescue
summary: Experience the joy of bingo and pet rescue combined! With delightful gameplay, embark on missions to save adorable pets while enjoying your favorite bingo games.

name: Bizzy Robo
summary:
If you are looking for a game that will really push your limits, make you think beyond the line and enjoy the numerous challenges that only logic and sharp mind solves, Bizzy Robo is the ideal game for you!

Stunning graphics in space environment, 10 different stations and 100 levels to repair, cute little Robos that need your help in pushing the objects into right places limited by moves, only clever decisions and the most persistent players can succeed.
The race to the top has began, lets see who can make it till the end!

name: Bird Tale
summary:
Our young birds, recently born, are preparing their first challenge in life, to learn how to fly! This is where you'll need to help them.
With one touch easy mechanic, touch the screen to make them flap their wings. Not so easy though, the forest they are is filled with obstacles including trees, spikes and forest folks such as Bee.
Through your way, you'll collect fruits and our birds love them! Better, you can use them to unlock new baby birds, themes and features through the store!

name: Binary Non-Binary
summary: Top down puzzle where you control both characters with the same input.

name: Biscats
summary: Biscats is an upcoming visual novel with erotic themes and female empowerment. The player follows the events after the homonymous comic where Katetoo, an underground tattoo artist from the center of São Paulo, will share her adventures of independent sex and sexual freedom.

name: Bitter/Sweet Blythe
summary:
On their birthday, Bunnie (renameable + pick your pronouns) makes a wish, but will they get more than they bargained for when a bunny-eared being named Blythe shows up to give them their best-ever birthday?

Made in under a month for Yandere Jam 2023.

name: Big Buck Hunter: Marksman
summary: For over 20 years, Big Buck Hunter has been a cultural icon as the world’s favorite hunting game. Millions of players have gotten hooked on the simple-to-play, hard-to-master game in their favorite bars, restaurants and arcades around the globe. Now, the legendary arcade franchise is introducing a sharp-shooting, competitive twist to the classic series and bringing the best-selling title to an exciting new place - your fingertips!

name: Bingaboll
summary: You are a basketball that handles gravity and your job is to get into the hoop before the bells ring, you have 24 seconds to overcome the obstacles and get in

name: Big Yeetus
summary: As the unicorn Big Yeetus you have to run along a parcour to the top of the castle. Most things in the game will kill you instantly if you touch them. This is a difficult game that takes some practice to beat. When you have learned how to pass a section you can finish it very fast though.

name: Bingo Pinball Gameroom
summary: A collection of 80 Bingo Pinball simulations. Discover why people became addicted to these mysterious machines in the past. 'For amusement only', but used for gambling nevertheless. Too dangerous, so eventually banned in many states. Start right away: Bally Show Time is included, free to use!

name: Bizarre Mushroom Cycle Simulator
summary: The bizarre mushrooms will surely bring you surprise and healing. Watch them with enchanting fireflies, and listen to the forest sounds. Experience a unique life only mushrooms offer. Living as a mushroom isn't so bad after all. Let's fully enjoy the mushroom life together!

name: Birnchen & Friends: Minor Confrontations
summary: Visit Pear and Mr. Blue in their playroom and fight each other for a bowl of candy in this colorful RTS! Whether it's fruity attack or stormy chaos, you choose the side!

name: Bird Watching Simulator
summary: An avid bird watching simulator with realistic watching mechanics. Grab your binoculars and build your attention span, Bird Watching Simulator is an unbelievably relaxing and interactive game that draws you so close to nature, it feels like you're apart of it.

name: Biosmose
summary: To address the sterility of the world, a single seed can change everything. Blending contemplation and puzzle-solving, Biosmose is a game that invites you to revitalize depleted environments. Sow, discover, and learn to sustain various plants in this colorful universe.

name: Bit Orchard: Animal Valley - Magnificent Edition
Bird Legend
summary:
"Bird Legend" is telling your story of heroes fighting vs blocks,bricks,numbers and bombs.
Fresh and original game play, made with honor!
Create your legend now!

name: Big Adventure: Trip to Europe 5 - Collector's Edition
summary: "Big Adventure: Trip to Europe 5" is a hidden object game that offers you an exciting journey through 15 beautiful European countries. During the game, you will find interesting objects in historical places of Europe and Scandinavia, play exciting mini-games and collect tons of objects souvenirs.

name: Big Boo's Revenge
summary: A romhack with 91 exits

name: Biophilia
summary: Worlds of darkness hidden among tech-bases that harbor primordial secrets. Biophilia is an ode to the blackness of the night, to the forests of the ancients, to the forgotten gods and to a life of secrets among the darkness. Where once there was progress, now only the bones of a lost science remain. Tech-bases surrounded by forests, outposts in the middle of the night, caves that hide the eyes of the beast, secret bases lost among the trees, etc. This is Biophilia, the fear, the love... to live in eternal darkness.

name: Bingo Pinball Gameroom: Bally Big Wheel
summary: Simulation of an electromechanical Bingo Pinball machine, model Big Wheel. Manufactured by Bally in 1968.

name: Bifrost
summary: Single map based on the idea of rainbow bridges.

name: Big Job
summary: Gear up for an adrenaline-fuelled 1980s British bank heist. Play as an ex-SAS miner turned outlaw in a third-person destructible cover shooter. Shoot sneak & smash through punks skinheads & bent coppers then escape through London Master lockpicking safe-cracking & hacking as you plan for the BIG JOB

name: Bit.Trip Rerunner
summary: Rerunner defines rhythm gaming, combining nostalgia with innovative mechanics and a fresh art style, making it a must-play experience for gamers of all backgrounds.

name: Bingo Pinball Gameroom: Bally Show Time
summary: This is a Bally Bingo Pinball simulation, model Show Time, manufactured in 1957.

name: Bingo Pinball Gameroom: Bally Miss America Deluxe
summary: This is a Bally Bingo Pinball simulation, model Miss America DeLuxe, manufactured in 1977.

name: Bingo Pinball Gameroom: Bally Big Show
summary: Simulation of an electromechanical Bingo Pinball machine, model Big Show. Manufactured by Bally in 1956.

name: Bingo Pinball Gameroom: Bally Bikini
summary: This is a Bally Bingo Pinball simulation, model model Bikini, manufactured in 1961.

name: Bingo Pinball Gameroom: Bally Beauty
summary: Simulation of an electromechanical Bingo Pinball machine, model Beauty. Manufactured by Bally in 1952.

name: Bingo Pinball Gameroom: Bally Big Time
summary: Simulation of an electromechanical Bingo Pinball machine, model Big Time. Manufactured by Bally in 1954.

name: Big Bang
summary: Big Bang is an undeniably psychedelic platformer created by the mysterious coding group known as Psycore. Chock full of snazzy graphics, deadly teddies, and fiendish level designs, this is definitely not one to miss.

name: Bit Heroes Runner
summary:
Bit Heroes Runner: Pixel Blitz takes pixel games on the run with an action-packed scroller that will leave you out of breath!
Escape the ferocious boss of each zone with all your loot and limbs intact and grow your 8 Bit Hero in the next installment of the Kongregate Bitverse.
Collect coins and power-ups to give your personalized 8 Bit Hero the boost they need to race over obstacles and cross the finish line to safety.
Turn your mistakes into valuable XP and watch your hero grow fast as you complete goals and unlock unique levels based on nostalgic pixel graphics.

name: Big Buck Hunter: Shooter's Challenge
summary: Released in February 2002.

name: Big Buck Hunter
summary: Released in December 2000.

name: Big Buck Hunter: Call of the Wild
summary: Released in March 2005.

name: Big Buck Hunter II: Sportsman's Paradise
summary: Released in August 2002.

name: Biohazard RE: 2 - Cloud Version: Z Version
Bikkuri Pro Wrestling
summary: Wrestling video game released in Japan in 1988.

name: Billiard Academy Real Break
summary: A pool game where you are awarded Pictures of some Asian babes when you win the round.

name: Bit Orchard: Animal Valley - Superb Edition
Bingo Pinball Gameroom: United Starlet
summary: Simulation of an electromechanical Bingo Pinball machine, model Starlet. Manufactured by United in 1955.

name: Bingo Pinball Gameroom: United Rio
summary: Simulation of an electromechanical Bingo Pinball machine, model Rio. Manufactured by United in 1953.

name: Bingo Pinball Gameroom: United Mexico
summary: Simulation of an electromechanical Bingo Pinball machine, model Mexico. Manufactured by United in 1954.

summary: Simulation of an electromechanical Bingo Pinball machine, model Manhattan. Manufactured by United in 1955.

name: Bingo Pinball Gameroom: United Hawaii
summary: Simulation of an electromechanical Bingo Pinball machine, model Hawaii. Manufactured by United in 1954.

name: Bingo Pinball Gameroom: United Caravan
summary: Simulation of an electromechanical Bingo Pinball machine, model Caravan. Manufactured by United in 1956.

name: Bingo Pinball Gameroom: United Brazil
summary: Simulation of an electromechanical Bingo Pinball machine, model Brazil. Manufactured by United in 1956.

name: Bingo Pinball Gameroom: Agogo

summary: Bit Tower is an exciting Tower Defense game that will immerse you in an epic battle between adventurers and monsters! Hire adventurers, place them in the arena, face countless waves, and secure your spot on the leaderboard.

name: Bingo
summary: Dive into the captivating realm of Bingo! Venture into the pulsating Bingo Arena where every moment is charged with thrill and expectation.

name: Bizarro Untergrund
summary:
A game written by Optimus6128 for 3DO using his own 3D engine called Bizarro Engine.

It is an early version made for the Retro Platform Jam #6, not entirely finished and the engine is not optimized yet to handle the big sprawling caves. Early versions of it with very small rooms or caves would run a bit better, but near the end he decided to draw some more corridors and cave as he thought it was very small for a level.

You basically use your particle weapon to mine gems of four kinds. Jagurel, Saturnite, Playstone and Threedium. Oxygen is depleted so you can't be too greedy. Green lamps will light the surrounding area but don't get too near as they damage you. Pink flowers are bouncing traps, they will proper you if you get close. Finally, there is no ending yet, either you jump in a box of stars like the first level or you die and the screen turns red. It's a work in progress that he will continue and optimize later after the compo ends.

name: Big Bad Sudoku Book
summary: If you like Sudoku you have to try Big Bad Sudoku Book. It's our opinion that many other versions of the game sort of take the fun out of it. They won't let you enter in wrong numbers, and if you ask for a hint they straight up give you the answer to a cell. Why not just put up a puzzle and solve it for you? I'll tell you why, cause that's not fun! Our approach is a lot different. Our hints guide you to answers without flat out giving it away. We provide the tools you need to solve the puzzle with your brain, just like a real paper sudoku book but better!

name: Biggles On Mars
summary: Grandson of the famous pilot, Biggles makes his living defending the planet of Mars with his rickety plane. Can he overcome a menacing scheme and also finally move into a new line of work?

name: Birmingham City Club Football 2005
summary: The follow-up edition to Codemasters' multi-title soccer franchise (each dedicated to a single team in the UK and continental European football league and featuring unique presentation and other team-specific aspects), the 2005 series is powered by an accelerated game engine and new animation system to deliver faster and more responsive gameplay for precise control on the pitch. With twice the amount of official team content in each game, great skill moves and new game modes including Career, Practice and classic Scenarios (plus new clubs added to the line-up), the new Club Football 2005 range will bring players even closer to the heart of the action and the heart of their team.

name: Birola World
summary: Birola World is a Kaizo Light with 12 levels and 1 credit, totaling 13 exits. Hack created in honor of some Brazilian streamers friends of Kaizo Mario.

name: Bibi & Tina: Das grosse Reiterfest
summary: The first great Wii game for all horse lovers! Here the dream of horseback riding comes true and thanks to the child-friendly controls and age-appropriate level design, fast-paced fun is guaranteed for young and old. Versatility and activity are in demand! A big riding festival is being organized at the Martinshof and of course a lot of help is needed to test the riding games and competition courses. In this way, users can prove on different riding courses that they are firmly in the saddle and are ahead of the game when riding. It's also about jumping on the trampoline, throwing cans, decorating cakes, balancing, feeding ducks and throwing horseshoes - because only the best get hold of the golden horseshoes, with which all tracks and horses can be unlocked.

name: Bionic Breakthrough
summary: Bionic Breakthrough was one of only two games written to be used with the MindLink controller, a headband that the player wore on his head and plugged into the joystick port. The idea was that the MindLink's sensors would pick up any facial movements or muscle twitches the player would make. The problem was that the MindLink didn't work very well in initial test runs, and even when it did worked players would complain of headaches and dizziness from twitching their face. Bionic Breakthrough is really just Super Breakout with a title screen. It's unknown if this was just supposed to be a demo to show what the MindLink could do, or if it was actually a standalone product. Before the game starts there is a screen where the word MindLink slowly scrolls to the bottom, this is for callibration. On this screen the player can move the text block left and right to make sure the Mindlink is working properly. Bionic Breakthrough was never released.

name: Big Heavy
summary: Big Heavy is a demanding 2D souls-like boss rush. Roll, block, hack, and slash your way to freedom from the clutches of the Sadist King. Only 11 colossal brutes stand in your way. Will you escape with your life or become another victim of the arena?

name: Birds On A Wire
summary: Make your way through a world of incredibly cute birds in this adorable action puzzle. Launch birds and group them together by color to set them free from the board. Don't let them bemuse you with their laughter, charm and trickery or you will be defeated. Stay on the lookout for bonuses, and find the Big Golden Bird artifact to help you stonewall these darling little guys.

name: Big Vehicle Simulator Games Bundle: Truck Farming Flight Construction Bus Ship
summary: This bundle includes 6 games: Bus Driving Simulator 22, Farmer Sim, Flight Sim 2019, Extreme Trucks Simulator, Ship Simulator, Truck Simulator USA. Bus Driving Simulator 22 Get behind the wheel and become a professional bus driver!

name: Bikkuri Mouse
summary: The first PS2 mouse-compatible software. The game may look like another graphic/paint tool software, but it is more of a freestyle drawing software with games. It does not feature zooming capabilities, or let players draw pixel-by-pixels. It only uses 12 colors, and lets players select different types of canvas. Aside from normal pens, there are pens that draw pictures for players. For example, a circle drawn with a black pen may become a black tire, or a circle drawn with a blue pen may become a puddle of water, and a circle drawn with a yellow pen may become a full moon. Other canvases are more like mini-games, where the player will need to draw a frying pan to catch eggs thrown by a game character, or draw objects on top of a jumping board and plunge them into the sea. Players can save pictures they've drawn and record a three-minute movie clip showing their drawing's progression. Up to about ten clips can be recorded.

name: Big Screen Sudoku
summary: Over 100,000 Sudoku puzzles.

name: Bibi Blocksberg: Grundschule Mathematik - Klasse 1 bis 4
summary: It must be jinxed: Maths causes Bibi Blocksberg quite a headache! But luckily, she can count on her four friends Moni, Marita, Dennis and Florian. Each help Bibi in each respective form - and that's how practising turns into having fun. Assume Bibi's role and playfully learn arithmetic. By combining valuable exercises with a lot of fun the mathematics learning game helps primary school children deepen and broaden their proficiency and understanding of mathematics.

name: Bikkuriman Daijiten
summary: Bikkuriman Daijiten is a Bikkuriman game released by 3 o'Clock for Nintendo DS in August 2007. Similar to the 1988 Bikkuriman Daijikai, the game is an (improved) encyclopedia of the Akuma vs. Tenshi Seal series, containing seals from all 31 series. In the beginning the seals are all black and white, but players can obtain points and use them to buy Bikkuriman Choco, where the seals can be obtained and later viewed in color. Depending of the seal, once obtained they will also have extra content unlocked, like extra information, their alternate versions from other products (like Bikkuriman Ice), and the ability to move foil cards (like Black Zeus) to see their colors. Points are earned in three ways: Once per day a certain amount is given to the player, by answering questions in the quiz mode, or trading duplicated and unwanted (becoming black and white again and locking bonus content if all are given) seals for 5-150 (depending of the seal) points each. It is also possible to trade seals with other players.

name: Bigfoot's Journey

Learn about a real Bigfoot - a creature that has learned to hide, survive and travel through other dimensions, and guide him through the mazes.

Among the most important events of the twentieth century, three stand out: man went into space; man has been to the moon; the man became convinced that he was not the only possessor of intelligence on Earth.

Years have passed. The planet is in the middle of the 21st century. Humanity is on the verge of extinction. Nuclear winter is raging. Officially, hominology is listed as a pseudoscience, but in fact it is the most important scientific discipline, because the object of its study is real.

Each game is easy to learn and can be quickly mastered, and when you win, the cards dance just for you!

Hack ‘N’ Slash your way through Battle Axe, with true to form gameplay mechanics and the fantastical pixel art world of Mercia to discover.

Beat ‘em up in Final Vendetta with nostalgic arcade graphics and a tough cast of core characters to fight with.

name: Biohazard Anniversary Package
summary: The Biohazard Anniversary Package was released in Japan in 2013. This package consists of Biohazard Director's Cut, Biohazard 2 and Biohazard 3 as a digital download. This also includes physical copies of Biohazard Revival Selection & Biohazard 5 Gold Edition in Greatest Hits format. Finally, it comes with Biohazard 6 physical as well as the Biohazard 6 art book.

While Bill pursues the path of an enraged criminal, Carol teams up with her new friend Henry, and her brother Sam as they all play a part in bringing Carols' husband to justice!

Go on a crazy criminal journey as Bill, change sides, and try to stop him as Carol and Sam, or even play through some backstories / unseen moments of your favourite characters seen throughout the game!
