summary: Bison battle machine – merciless battles on powerful tanks. Survival races and tough battles with realistic physics.

name: Bird Feather: Aquamarine World
summary: You are bird. Just fly! Collect feathers in open world bird game. Collect more feathers to unlock nice Kingfisher photos. After collect all feathers you can just fly and enjoy!

name: Bingo Beavers: Kitchen
summary: Embark on a new adventure in the Bingo Beavers game as you expand the beaver mansion with a charming new room - the Kitchen.

name: Bingo Beavers: Bathroom
summary: Embark on a new adventure in the Bingo Beavers game as you expand the beaver mansion with a charming new room - the Bathroom.

name: Biped 2
summary: Adorable robots are back to save the day! Explore an unknown planet in this puzzle action-adventure game and experiment with our unique, innovative mechanics solo or in co-op with up to 4 players!

name: Big Tall Small
summary: Big Tall Small is an adventure puzzle platformer game that was developed by rob1221 and released on November 1, 2020. It can be found on many websites stuch as Newgrounds and Coolmath games.

name: Bill & Ted: Time & Time Again
summary:
In this game, you must help the future versions of yourself to collect all of the objects and return to the phone booth without touching another version of yourself.

You get only two lives, one as Bill the second as Ted.

name: Bird Jumper
summary: Bird Jumper is a platform puzzle game where you need to guide a hungry bird to eat all the worms! Navigate through dangerous obstacles and strategically plan your route to avoid deadly traps

name: Bible Master 2: The Chaos of Aglia
Biocatalyst
summary: Biocatalyst is a short horror visual novel set in the late 1990s with a PC-98 aesthetic.

name: Bighead
summary: Everything seems fine on a Saturday night, you're about to watch a horror movie with your partner, when suddenly something happens. Dive into this nightmarish story about big heads

name: Biolab Disaster
summary: Fight your way through an infected Biolab in this Jump'n'Run. Use your Plasma Gun to shoot everything that moves! There are 3 levels to explore and 6 types of enemies to fight.

name: Bikini Beach: Anime Girls Assault
summary: Are you ready to become the best shooter?

name: #!/Bin/Bash
summary: #!/bin/bash is a typing adventure game using linux terminal commands as controls. Yum some cake, touch some loot and bash those enemies!

name: Big Helmet Heroes
summary: Throw yourself into an epic 3D beat'em up adventure with adorable knights, full of surprising worlds and situations. Grab your buddy and play in 2 player co-op to save the princess, but this is only the beginning!

name: Bite Night
summary: Bite Night is a comedic first-person horror game that explores the idea of what if the big bad monster was bad at their job of being scary.

name: Birds Adventure
summary: Embark on an exciting journey with Flynn, a brave bird whose peaceful life is interrupted when his son is captured. Determined to retrieve him, Flynn plunges into a dangerous quest through stunning lands fraught with peril.

name: Birdfight
summary: birdfight is a game about backyard birds in biplanes brawling in bold and bright battlegrounds to win worms!

name: Bio Prototype 2
summary: There are many weirdos in the mysterious underground base, and a great evolution is being written. Activate 50 genetic potentials, transplant 60 mutated organs, and use 200 precise entry codes to create a life form that exceeds the limits of nature.

name: Binary Barrier
summary: Defend your AI capital against endless alien invasions in this space shmup-inspired tower defense with roguelite randomness. Dissect bodies and ships to unlock weirdly powerful tech. Upgrade your base with turrets, turning your screen into a symphony of perfect destruction!

name: Bike Stunt 3D Freestyle
summary: Carefully move 3d motorcycle stunt games for offroad driving tracks in this motorcycle stunt game 2023 is completely different from other bike games 2022 so you can easily perform unlimited 3d offroad stunts.

name: Big Pig
summary: Collect all the food and don't get killed by the pigs that are chasing you !

name: Bikkuriman Wonder Collection
summary: A new mobile game in the Bikkuriman series!

name: Big Top Best Kids Games Bundle
summary: 17 of the best Games for Children in one big games collection bundle. The ultimate top educational and fun to play game pack for kids and toddlers.

name: Big Top
summary: This is a prototype of a children's educational game that was done by James WickStead Design Associates. It was archived from JWDA graphics designer Robin Ballweg. According to to her, the game was never fully developed.

name: Bit & Quantum: Save the Earth!
summary: Bit & Quantum: Save the Earth is an interactive experience, following a pair of astronauts trying to find a way to help a planet in peril; Through hope and wit solutions can be found despite coming across unexpected challenges.

name: Big Range Hunting
summary: Get ready to track a bear in Montana, hunt for deer from a moving 4x4, and much more! The 16 challenges in Big Range Hunting will take you through American forests, the African savannah, and the snow-covered plains of Canada. You'll hunt 8 types of animals (lion, deer, duck, bear, etc.) with various weapons, including a scope rifle, crossbow, and air rifle. Whether you're a shooting game fan or an occasional player, get ready to experience the thrill of the hunt in this shooting game for everyone, where the animals will amaze you with their ultra-realistic reactions!

name: Biblios: Tome of Darkness
summary: Biblios: Tome of Darkness is a fast paced first person shooter inspired by the biggest hits of the 1990s and Boomer Shooter revival. Fight a host of unique and challenging enemies, wield a powerful arsenal of weapons, and search high and low for secrets and lore notes to reveal the mysterious motives of the evil Acolytes of Seth.

name: Billy Bear Visits Luey
summary: This is an interactive story book aimed at younger children, where they join Billy Bear to visit his friend Luey. The game consists of 8-bit speech samples which the game use for reading the story to the player.

name: Bilhetes e Boatos
summary: "Bilhetes e Boatos" is a Visual Novel that simulates the daily life of a school like any other. Everything seems normal until mysterious notes and anonymous profiles start to appear. The tension increases more and more, and one question echoes in everyone's mind: Who is behind all of this? Play now and start your investigation!

name: Big & Small House
summary: Explore the house of Big & Small.

name: BigFool
summary: A small little game where your friends and you have a once in a lifetime opportunity: Hunt BigFool. BigFool is an elusive, fearsome creature of the night from unknown origins. Explore the Crimblr Forest and various points of interest, keep an eye and an ear out, and take down this iconic beast.

name: Big Boo's Haunt
summary: This map is based on Big Boo's Haunt from Super Mario 64 but with changes/improvements all over the place (for instance, you can actually see through all the windows, which you couldn't in Super Mario 64).

name: Big Orbit
summary: A large starship orbiting earth which duke will dock within a shuttle

name: BigMcGee
summary: 14 speedjam SP levels made on a 64 unit grid, three custom skyboxes, and four music tracks.

name: Big Boy's Birthday Party
summary: Large, open medieval castle with courtyards, a throne room, a wine cellar, and a dungeon.

name: Bigfoot Life
summary: A simulator game where you live life as Bigfoot. Catch fish, forage for mushrooms and berries, build shelters, and more. Survive and live your best Bigfoot Life.

name: Bid Battle: Auction War Simulator Storage Hunter
summary: Outbid, Explore, Profit! Unearth the treasures of the auction world!

name: Bitsy Bits: The Secret of Magic
summary: Bitsy Bits: The Secret of Magic Bounce your way through this magical action filled adventure as you wield dozens of magic to bounce away characters through colorful environments

name: BirdLingo: A birdsong learning game
summary: Welcome to BirdLingo, a game designed for honing your bird song recognition skills. Immerse yourself in a cute and relaxing atmosphere as you learn the songs of the 44 most common birds in Europe.

name: Big City Dreaming
summary: An open world visual novel filled with lots of intrigue and stories.

name: Bird Mother
summary: You play a bird who has to raise his chicks in a three stage game: nest building, chick feeding and flying.

name: Bitter
summary: This game is a vibrant puzzle game that combines upbeat background music with a simple yet engaging gameplay mechanism.

name: Bizarre
summary:
The circus is in town! Step up and try your luck!

Take aim with the cannon, gun, or balls in each challenging event!

Smash those coconuts and take home a victory!

Can you beat the fair?

name: Big-Time Butter Baron
summary: A.P. Butterworth runs the most successful butter factory in the world, but he can't remain the biggest of the Big-Time Butter Barons without the right staff! Clock in at the butter factory and slot together those butter shapes ready for delivery in this creamily-smooth puzzler!

name: Big Sky Country: Book 1
summary: Big Sky Country, Book 1 is the first book of the Big Sky Country series. It is followed by Big Sky Country, Book 2.

name: Big Sky Country: Book 2
summary: Big Sky Country, Book 2 is the second and final book of the Big Sky Country series. It succeeds its first book, Big Sky Country, Book 1.

name: Bike Rampage!
summary: Dan the Biker has one goal... Run over everything with his bike.

name: Binky's Facts and Opinions
summary: Welcome to Binky's facts and opinions! Do you know the difference between facts and opinions?

name: Birdwatcher
summary: Birdwatcher is a short visual novel created for O2A2 2024 with strict asset limitations.

name: biketerra
summary: Biketerra is a web-based indoor cycling app that lets you create and ride any real-world routes.

name: Biophage
summary:
You are a single-celled organism.

Climb walls and ceilings, and find new ways to build up and maintain speed!

Punt your enemies into the air and finish them off with a grab and slam!

Explore the strange ecosystems laid out in your path, and feel the essence of nature!

name: Big Time Gangsta
summary: Build up your gang from the toughest bunch of STREET SOLDIERS, ex-cons and wanted crooks roaming the blocks. To survive and thrive in these dangerous neighborhoods you need to TAKE OUT RIVAL GANGS before they get to you first. HUSTLING and dealing, SHOOTING and stealing is the only way to take these streets, earn COLD HARD CASH and OWN THE CITY

name: Bishi Bashi Special
summary:
Bishi Bashi Special is a compilation (and conversion) of the Konami arcade titles Bishi Bashi Champ, Super Bishi Bashi Champ and Handle Champ.

Gameplay is made up of tons of mini games, all of which use a simple 3-button interface that mimics the arcade originals. The mini games encompass a wide variety of button-mashing, timing and button combination games. The games themselves can be anything from making hamburgers, throwing a pie down a church aisle to balancing a car on a floating narrow gravel road and much more.

The game can be played alone, vs a computer player or play up to eight people using a multi-tap and three controllers.

name: Bit Esc
summary: Break free from the system in Bit Esc, an action/adventure platformer where Bit sets out to escape from the tyrannic OS. Explore the digital world, overcome frantic challenges, meet new friends and make tough decisions that’ll determine the fate of Bit and the world around them.

name: Bible Verse Challenge
summary:
Test your Bible Verse Knowledge. Try to get the highest score without running out of hearts!

Need to break in the middle of the challenge! The game saves your progress after each question, so return whenever you want.

If you need help you can use the Book Review to study up without worrying about losing hearts, but it doesn't save a score. You'll also be able to use multiple versions of the Bible including KJV (King James Version) and ASV (American Standard Version).

Don't forget to go into settings to update your profile, book version, and control the sound effects and music.

name: Big City Driver: Truck Parking Simulator
summary:
Your task is to carefully park large trucks. Each task is a new challenge: you will need to manoeuvre through narrow passages, avoid obstacles and accurately park your truck in the designated area. Every situation is unique, and with each level the difficulty increases, forcing you to do everything possible to cope with the task! Parking a large truck is not so easy, especially if it is equipped with a heavy trailer. You will have to show concentration and precision to correctly estimate the distance and turning angle.

Learn to operate heavy equipment and use your skills to avoid penalties for mistakes. In the game you will find different types of trucks and trailers, each of which requires its own approach and driving style. Collect points for fulfilling the conditions and improve your skills, opening new levels and more difficult tasks.

name: Bioweaver
summary: Bioweaver is an RPG game with the main content of treasure hunting and character building. You can use basic programming logic to deeply customize your skill sets, and you can also create organs with different attributes and functions with the special crafting system.

name: Bitter Dream
summary: Bitter Dream is a set of 10 MBF21 maps with all original music composed by LVENdead, intended to take you on a dark, cosmic journey with a variety of gameplay and a loose narrative thread. Maps start off easy and escalate to fairly challenging by the end by most reasonable measures. Bitter Dream will take most players between 5-6 hours to complete, as there are a few longer maps in the set. As such, it has been divided into 3 distinct Episodes.

name: Bible Puzzle
summary: Bible Puzzle offers a relaxing and uplifting experience as you piece together beautiful biblical scenes. When you’re fully relaxed, it’s time to take on the challenge of ranked matches. Think you’ve got what it takes to beat other players?

name: Bionic Commando: Re-Armed
summary: Classic side-scrolling action is reporting back for duty on mobile! Revisit the new look arcade hit, swinging and shooting your way to save the world!

name: Bird Simulator 24
summary: Take flight in Bird Simulator 24, an outrageous action game where you reclaim your rightful territory from the humans and assert your genetic dominance! As a fearless bird, your mission is simple: rule the skies, reclaim your homeland, and fight the humans in the most hilarious ways imaginable.

name: Bitorpito Deluxe
summary: Bitorpito Deluxe is the sequel to Bitorpito. A game about repeating back patterns but this time in a deluxe form! Meet new game modes, graphics and more within the biggest project yet.

name: Big Oil: Build an Oil Empire
summary: Big Oil leads you into times of the oil industry pioneers. Start your career in one of the historical scenarios or face the challenge of modern times. Found your very own company and lead it to the biggest oil imperium on earth. Whether in single-player or multiplayer, demonstrate your strategic ability to become the next "Anaconda" Rockefeller of the BIG OIL world. Build an oil empire. Turn crude to cash. Seventeen historical and modern scenarios from the beginning of the 20th Century until today. Challenging game modes such as historical scenarios, easy or advanced mode, single-player or multiplayer up to 6 players. Extra class graphics with the 3D-Oxygene-Engine. Over 300 different buildings and vehicles out of 3 centuries. Exact historical events such as earthquakes, wars and other catastrophes with direct influence on your company. Complex simulation of real cities like Los Angeles with job market, infrastructure and schools.

name: Bikmin 269 DX: Director's Cut
summary: Bikmin 269 DX: Director's Cut is a full game mod of Pikmin 2 with a brand new story, and new areas! Yes, every area is new and fully modeled! This isn't just a "repaint" of Pikmin 2, it contains an entire new story with new characters from a parallel Pikmin universe where many things are strange, a little bit memey, or just not correct. With over 130 new treasures to collect and brand new mechanics to make the game feel fresh this mod is essentially a new game. This mod is not meant to be taken too seriously in most aspects, but its gameplay is meant to be fresh and creative for fans of the Pikmin series to enjoy even if they don't care about the memes.

name: Birdo vs. Macintosh
summary: Join BIRDO on a quest unlike any other: a mission to stop the evil Steve Jobs from sullying the good name of Windows 95 (and the soon to be released Windows 98) using a smear campaign that goes far and wide across the vast landscapes of Silicon Valley. It's up to you, a lowly pink Birdo named "Birdo", to stop the antics of the recently reestablished CEO before things are too late in Computer Land, 1997.

name: Bike Dirt Extreme 3D
summary: Ride, stunt, and soar: become the ultimate dirt bike champion!

name: Biological Incident
summary: Cases of disappearances have become more frequent in the small town. The tracks lead to an empty house on the outskirts of the city...

name: Bingo Rush 2
summary: Same publisher as the currently popular game Bingo Blitz. This game is discontinued.

name: Big Dengi
summary: Big Dengi is a wild blend of visual novel and clicker. Originally it was supposed to be a part of Anti-Capitalistic Game Jam. Play as a faceless clerk in one of the worst corporations in the world. It's violent, unsafe, and unhinged. Will you keep your humanity or will you succumb to the merciless capitalistic machine? Unfortunately the question is rhetorical.

name: Bimfli & His Time Travels: Paris
summary: Bimfli and his time travels is an interactive graphic novel about the adventures of Bimfli, a young architect. It includes children's reading texts, dynamic images and ambient music.

name: Biztopia
summary:
Welcome to Biztopia!
A unique trade city full of business and opportunities awaits you! Start with a small order, build your own world of commerce, and either go solo or team up with your friends to discover the next big entrepreneurial ventures!

name: Bimfli & His Time Travels: Rome
summary: Bimfli and his time travels is an interactive graphic novel about the adventures of Bimfli, a young architect. It includes children's reading texts, dynamic images and ambient music.

name: Bible Trivia
summary: How well do you know your Bible Trivia? Bible Trivia has never been so much fun. Challenge yourself or have a Bible Trivia night with friends and family in Party Mode!

name: Biohazard: Siberia
summary: Trapped in a secret research facility, you discover a terrifying truth- everything was a simulation… until now. Escape mutated horrors, uncover dark experiments, and decide your fate in this mind-bending, atmospheric survival horror.

name: Big Boy Adventure
summary: Big Boy Adventure is a casual, singleplayer adventure RPG.Begin the adventure on a small island and help the villagers by fulfilling their requests and keeping them safe from the slimes and monsters that roam the island with increasingly anomalous behavior.

name: Bing in Wonderland: Wings & Weapon Looks - Azure Dragon
summary: This DLC includes: 1 new gorgeous appearance for each weapon, for a total of 5 weapon appearances for 5 different weapons. A pair of wings with a matching theme to the weapon appearance. While using the wings, holding the spacebar in mid-air allows for a slow descent. Equip at the weapon NPC.

name: Bing in Wonderland: Wings & Weapon Looks - Dragon Slayer
summary: This DLC includes: 1 new gorgeous appearance for each weapon, for a total of 5 weapon appearances for 5 different weapons. A pair of wings with a matching theme to the weapon appearance. While using the wings, holding the spacebar in mid-air allows for a slow descent. Equip at the weapon NPC.

name: Bing in Wonderland: Wings & Weapon Looks - Judgment
summary: This DLC includes: 1 new gorgeous appearance for each weapon, for a total of 5 weapon appearances for 5 different weapons. A pair of wings with a matching theme to the weapon appearance. While using the wings, holding the spacebar in mid-air allows for a slow descent. Equip at the weapon NPC.

name: Bing in Wonderland: Wings & Weapon Looks - Purgatory
summary: This DLC includes: 1 new gorgeous appearance for each weapon, for a total of 5 weapon appearances for 5 different weapons. A pair of wings with a matching theme to the weapon appearance. While using the wings, holding the spacebar in mid-air allows for a slow descent. Equip at the weapon NPC.

name: Bing in Wonderland: Wings & Weapon Looks - Black Tortoise
summary: This DLC includes: 1 new gorgeous appearance for each weapon, for a total of 5 weapon appearances for 5 different weapons. A pair of wings with a matching theme to the weapon appearance. While using the wings, holding the spacebar in mid-air allows for a slow descent. Equip at the weapon NPC.

name: Bing in Wonderland: Wings & Weapon Looks - Vermilion Bird
summary: This DLC includes: 1 new gorgeous appearance for each weapon, for a total of 5 weapon appearances for 5 different weapons. A pair of wings with a matching theme to the weapon appearance. While using the wings, holding the spacebar in mid-air allows for a slow descent. Equip at the weapon NPC.

name: Bing in Wonderland: Wings & Weapon Looks - White Tiger
summary: This DLC includes: 1 new gorgeous appearance for each weapon, for a total of 5 weapon appearances for 5 different weapons. A pair of wings with a matching theme to the weapon appearance. While using the wings, holding the spacebar in mid-air allows for a slow descent. Equip at the weapon NPC.

name: Bit-Cremental: Fishistry
summary: Grow fish with a gashapon twist in this bite-sized idler. Feed, nurture, and watch as fisher people reel in mature catches, earning money to upgrade things like feeding, growth, and fishing speeds for even faster profits.

name: Birchwood
summary:
Birchwood is a narrative driven psychological horror game which delves into the dark-side of 1980’s Britain.
After an ecological and personal tragedy befell your household a decade earlier, you must now return home and uncover the morbid secrets which lay at the heart of the once idyllic farmhouse, while confronting the evil which destroyed your family.
Armed with nothing but a VHS camcorder, it’s up to you to solve the mystery of what really happened on that fateful night ten years ago.

name: Bird Go Sky
summary: A multiplayer game where you play as one of multiple bird characters. You fly through a world with multiple themed areas, build nests to upgrade your character or unlock new species, while exploring, interacting and role-playing with friends and strangers.

name: Big Blind
summary: Where Sound Becomes Sight, Style Meets Violence. Step into the world of darkness as a blind protagonist who sees through sound in this stylish 2D top-down shooter where every kill matters and style is everything.

name: Bike Park Simulator: BMX, Dirt Jump & MTB
summary: Bike Park Simulator is a realistic BMX, Dirt Jump, and MTB simulation featuring a large sandbox skatepark, multiple bike types, and fun physics-based riding. Perform tricks, explore diverse terrains, and become the most famous biker in the city!

name: Binary Star Hero
summary:
Binary Star is the country's top Super Hero. His light shines bright against any darkness... but the brighter the light illuminates, the darker the cast shadow becomes.

Discover who Binary Star is behind the mask.

name: Big Bible Town
summary: Designed for children in kindergarten through sixth grade, Big Bible Town aims to teach biblical lessons and Christian values through interactive gameplay: Create and customize your own virtual town inspired by biblical settings, participate in scripture-based adventures, and engage in activities that reinforce moral teachings.

name: Bilge Junction
summary:
Welcome to Bilge Junction, population 8: a dying town on the arctic highway. With the promise of a cheap roof over your head, you ran from your problems and wound up here.

But winter's setting in, and the fire keeps burning. A storm is on its way. There's something lurking in the pipeline that built the town. In three days' time, it's bound to escape.

name: Big Trouble in Little Chimney
summary: Krampus is Coming! Grab your Shotgun, finish your hot punch and don't forget your mission: Save the Christmas! Big Trouble in Little Chimney is highly-addictive and fast paced arena bullet-hell shooter.

name: Bipolar: The Tube
summary: East-Asia-theme horror visual novel with tarot elements. This game shares the same world with When the Wind Knocks (Ready to Kill) and The Dead Daughter. If you have played that game, you will meet an old friend here.

name: Big Buck Hunter Pro Adventure
summary: Big Buck Hunter Pro Adventure features Adventure Mode where players embark on their own custom hunting vacation across 18 different locations across North America.

name: Bimfli & His Time Travels: Japan
summary: Bimfli and his travels in time is an interactive graphic novel about the adventures of Bimfli, a young architect.

name: Bimfli & His Time Travels: Egypt
summary: Graphic novel about the adventures of a young traveling architect. Discover Bimfli and his friends in this beautiful story full of values and lessons.

name: Bimfli and His Travels In Time: Greece
summary: Bimfli and his travels in time is an interactive graphic novel about the adventures of Bimfli, a young architect.

name: Big Adventure 5-in-1 Bundle
summary: Wonderful trip around Europe through amazing touristic locations in more than 30 countries.

name: Big Hunt
summary:
This is Big Hunt, a pretty-hardcore roguelite-to-be action game, inpired by The Binding of Isaac & Noita.
Study your foes to spot and exploit their weaknesses.

name: Billgard
summary: Smash your friends in Billgard, a chaotic physics-based party brawler for couch and online multiplayer with up to 8 players. Kick your opponents off the table across different game modes!

name: Big's Fishing Quest
summary: One day Big the Cat was going to fish on his favorite fishing river and he noticed that the river was polluted and all the fishes were gone! So he begin a quest to find the culprits and make justice

name: Big Helmet Heroes: Exalted Edition
summary:
The Exalted Edition includes:
- Big Helmet Heroes
- Artbook & OST

name: Biofactory
summary: Build your living factory using organs and fleshy biomachines. Combine your pulsating machines to automate and scale up production. Mine, harvest, produce and assemble weird materials in a grimdark biopunk setting. No enemies or pressure, the hive mind has only one instinct: The factory must grow.

name: Bishoujo Super Street Fighter II: Glamor Queen
summary: Bishoujo Super Street Fighter II: Glamor Queen is a combo ROM Hack of the Sega Mega Drive version of Super Street Fighter II, where some of the characters are replaced with characters from various franchises. It draws some inspiration from several bootleg versions of Champion Edition, as well as other Street Fighter II ROM Hacks such as Street Fighter II: Mix and Super Street Fighter II Turbo: New Legacy.

name: Bing in Wonderland: Power Up Edition
summary: Fight, loot and upgrade your adventurer Bing!

name: Big Burger Store
summary: Big Burger Store is a 2D top down cooking game where you push around giant food items and serve burger orders to customers. Explore the busy world outside of work and participate in activities such as going fishing, fighting monsters, gambling, and so much more!

name: BitRick's Venture
summary: BitRick's Venture is an action-roguelite with procedurally generated maps. Take control of BitRick and face off against terrifying monsters armed with your pistol! Select your gun, find items and upgrades to make your character even stronger.

name: Big Buck Hunter: Ultimate Trophy
summary: Get ready to lock, load, and dominate the wild like never before with Big Buck Hunter: Ultimate Trophy! This groundbreaking experience takes the #1 arcade hunting game to thrilling new heights, delivering over 3X the content of its hit predecessor.

name: Birdfull
summary: Birdfull is a small relaxing idle game. Attract birds with feed, try to keep them longer, and discover all of them including the unique ones! Watch the birds, generate more eggs in real time, and customize your cozy bird space.

name: Big Buck Hunter: Ultimate Trophy - Deluxe Edition
summary:
Hunting doesn't get any more epic! This is Big Buck Hunter: Ultimate Trophy, but loaded with even more legendary content. Includes all Standard Edition content, plus:

• The Mythical “Buckzilla”
• The Infamous Headshots-Only “Zombie Deer”
• 30 more hunting sites
• And so much more!

name: Big Buck Hunter: Ultimate Trophy - Mythic Hunting Pack
summary: Get the Mythical "Buckzilla", infamous Headshots-Only "Zombie Deer", plus more!

name: Biodacity The Mansion
summary: Explore your way through a crooked Mansion in the aftermath of an apocalypse. Biological mutants ravaged the Earth! You are responsible for finding crucial information! Fight horrific creatures that lurk around every corner! Find and upgrade your weapons!

name: Birdigo
summary: A word game about migrating birds - inspired by Wordle and Balatro. Play cards, build your deck, trigger combos and guide your flock. From John August (Corpse Bride) and Corey Martin (Bonfire Peaks).

name: Birdie Up
summary: Flap the wings of a little bird!

name: Big Bucks
summary: Big Bucks is a platform game, based on the same principle of Monopoly but played in real time. Each player moves, and buys and sells land at the same time.

name: Big Adventure: Trip to Europe 8 - Collector's Edition
summary: AviGames presents the eighth game in the series of games "Big Adventure: Trip to Europe 8". It is a brand new hidden object game with an exciting new way of searching for objects and a lot of new interesting mini-games.

name: BioSynth: Rising
summary: Turn-based story-rich classical RPG set in a grim sci-fi world. Explore, collect powerful items and grow your heroes to defeat fearsome enemies, escape dangerous plots, and have an impact on the world.

name: Bio Goddess: Doomsday Begins
summary: Bio Goddess: Doomsday Begins is a third-person shooter survival game where players assume the role of a female high school student surviving in a school struck by a biochemical crisis. They investigate the events, uncover their connection to their father, and explore their own identity.

name: Bibi Bunny
summary: ​Bibi wakes up in an unknown place with messages from an unknown individual. This place seems unsafe, and Bibi must keep herself safe as she explores this seemingly abandoned place to find her brother.

name: Bill Wants to Retire
summary: By day a cozy farming sim, by night a doom like boomer shooter. Farm, gather resources, and craft powerful weapons because when night comes so do the wolves. Can you protect your chickens and make it to retirement?

name: Bite-Sized Scares
summary: Bite-Sized Scares is a small collection of short, retro, indie horror games; created by Aaron Wise & D. Zenith. Strap in, grab some snacks and get ready for some spooks!

name: Bibbidiba Fan Game
summary: Bibbidiba fan game is a vibrant and fast-paced platformer inspired by Hoshimachi Suisei's hit song "Bibbidiba". Players must guide Hoshimachi Suisei through magical and challenging levels to reach the final destination and find out what awaits her at the end.

name: Big Adventure: Trip to Europe 9 - Collector's Edition
summary:
Take an amazing trip through some of Europe's most inspiring locations, including ancient castles, culture centers, charming villages, and more!

Get the most out of every stop along the way by finding dozens of hidden objects and solving clever mini-games on an incredible vacation packed with fun and adventure!
This hidden object game is full of new and popular tourist spots.

Use your skills and knowledge to play mini-games and find all the hidden objects.

The collector's edition includes:
- Ten additional locations to explore!
- Find even more objects, but keep your eye out for a funny raccoon friend!
- Eight bonus mini-games and twelve more challenging puzzles!

name: Big Cat Jigsaw Quest
summary: Embark on a majestic adventure into the wild with "Big Cat Jigsaw Quest"—a thrilling puzzle game that immerses you in the untamed beauty of lions and tigers. Piece by piece, bring to life breathtaking scenes of roaring kings of the savanna and stealthy prowlers of the jungle.

name: Big Cat Jigsaw Quest: Expansion Pack 1
summary: Unlock 16 brand-new puzzles and embark on a majestic adventure into the wild! Immerse yourself in the untamed beauty of lions and tigers as you piece together breathtaking scenes that showcase the raw power and grace of nature's most iconic predators.

name: Big Cat Jigsaw Quest: Expansion Pack 2
summary: Unlock 16 brand-new puzzles and embark on a majestic adventure into the wild! Immerse yourself in the untamed beauty of lions and tigers as you piece together breathtaking scenes that showcase the raw power and grace of nature's most iconic predators.

name: Bipt
summary: BIPT is a single player time attack game with multiple endings. Figure out what to collect, and go for the best time! Bipt can slide, super jump, and teleport. Combine these tools and find the fastest path to the finish.

name: Bird Bump
summary: Don't bump into the ledge

name: Birdcage
summary: After a robbery, you find yourself trapped in a stranger's apartment and must escape without being seen by the police. To do this, you will need to gain the help of its strange resident and unravel the mysteries surrounding her.

name: Bits at Work
summary: Build the perfect workplace in this tiny office management sim and keep the lines going up and up and up!

name: Big Adventure: Trip to Europe 10 - Collector's Edition
summary: Immerse yourself in the atmosphere of European adventures with "Trip to Europe 10" and discover the continent from the comfort of your home!

name: Big City Adventure: Shanghai
summary: Collect postcards, learn all about this historic city, play exciting mini-games and earn cool mementos. It's a hidden object trip of a lifetime.

name: BitLiberator
summary: BitLiberator is a strategy/puzzle/action game where you eliminate corrupted Programs by either destroying them or reprogramming them. You can control friendly reprogrammed Programs and connect them into more powerful structures. You can also apply Upgrades to your Programs, allowing them to perform actions such as shooting enemies, shielding themselves from enemy fire, or slowing enemies down. However, be warned that, over time, corrupted Programs will detect you and start moving toward you.

name: Birdie
summary:
If you had dreams to be a bird, this game will make them true. Here you are a Birdie in some sci-fi world filled with robots, carnivorous plants, parachutes, raptors, barbarians, lasers, butterflies, magical doors, hyperspace, etc. You should survive in this world with help of your wings and flying techniques.

The game is flown in third-person view, where you may control a bird moving him/her left or right, flying up or descending down, and flapping the wings. To fly correctly, the bird has to move in the air at a certain speed. Once the latter increases, the bird is handy. If bird's speed drops below a certain threshold, the bird then follows one of the oldest laws of the universe, gravity. Flapping wings enables bird to gain altitude and flying down on the wings increases speed.

The scoreboard on the screen tells you your speed (red = stall), altitude, the remaining time before the night, your life energy (no energy = game over). Flying at altitude for too long will attract predators, give no points, and exhaust the energy unnecessarily. Eating butterflies allows you to recover energy, but remember that eating too much makes you aggressive!

The environment, where Birdie is flying, will change during the game. Starting in the forest, you will visit other dimensions through Magical Doors as well as descend the dungeons, and even meet lamas.

name: BingeWatcher
summary:
BingeWatcher is a daily game/trivia for cinema enthusiastics: each day at midnight, it will challenge you to find the title of a movie selected among the top grossing films of the played country.
To do so, the player have to reveal the details of the movie existing on its wikipedia page.

name: Billy Hatcher Hyper Shoot
summary:
Billy Hatcher Hyper Shoot is a Game Boy Advance multiboot game that which is unlocked by connecting to the Nintendo GameCube via the Nintendo GameCube - Game Boy Advance Link Cable. It was stored in RAM, and deleted after the session.

It was later ported to i-mode cell phones and distributed via Sonic Cafe, only in Japan.

name: Bionics: We Will Evolve
summary: Take the role of Jonas Schmidt, a private investigator trapped in a deranged professor's house. Uncover the grim secrets of human experiments and grotesque machinery, all while solving puzzles and avoiding monstrous creations. Can you escape before you become the next test subject?

name: Bionicle: The Legend of Mata Nui Rebuilt
summary: Bionicle: The Legend of Mata Nui is a canceled action-adventure video game developed by Saffire. In 2018, two developmental builds of the game were leaked online. YouTube community The Beaverhouse went on to found Litestone Studios, an independent video game development studio, with the goal of completing the game with support for modern computers. Version 1.0 of the updated game, Bionicle: The Legend of Mata Nui Rebuilt, was released on August 10, 2019.

name: Birzzle
summary:
A new brand of Drag n Drop block puzzle game lining up the same type of birds and making it disappear by the use of fingertip. Provides optimized system which sustains better flexibility and simplicity of movements in touch control than prior puzzle games on the market; in return, provides a quick action arcade puzzle anyone can enjoy.

Just move the birds freely. That’s all.
Move your fingers really fast. Then, you could be the number one.

name: Big Sea Fishing
summary: Players are tasked with catching the most fish before the time runs out. Good hand-eye coordination is required to angle the hook to catch the biggest fish; the bigger the fish, the more points the player will get. Once a fish has been caught, the player must reel in as fast as possible to confirm the catch and add it to their score. Tickets are decided depending on the amount of points each player has when the time runs out. Multiple power-ups help you along with your fishing adventure, such as quick hook, multi hook (2 hooks), net area capture, reel, freeze the screen and in the enchanted sea rapid fire. Gameplay is quick and easy to understand, making it suitable for players of all ages.

name: Big Dig Energy
summary: Do you have the Big Dig Energy!? The best co-op mining game with online and split-screen multiplayer for up to 4 players! Team up, dig deep, mine energy ore, and upgrade your tools. Reach the planets core to fuel the rocket and leave Earth!

name: Bionicle: Command The Toa Mahri
summary: Command The Toa Mahri was a series of 6 web games on LEGO's Bionicle website were the players controlled the Toa Mahri in different games, eventually a final game would be released that would combine all 6 games were palying through all 6 abbreviated versions of the game to unlock the final level, where depending on how many games you succeeded, the amount of surviving Toa you will have to complete the final level.

name: Bionicle Defenders
summary: A tower defense game based on the 2007 wave of LEGO Bionicle.

name: Bionicle: Glatorian Arena
summary: 3D Fighting web game based on the first part of the 2009 Bionicle story.

name: Bionicle: Glatorian Arena 2
summary: The sequel to the 3D Fighting game Glatorian Arena based on the second half of Bionicle's 2009 story and featuring new characters from it.

name: Birb Game
summary: A racing game where you play as a bird and race in single player or online multiplayer

name: Biophobia
summary: A woman is violated by a man. In a final act of rebellion to preserve her humanity, she takes control and opens her stomach. Unable to finish what she started she waits for you, and asks you not to look away.

name: Bill Killem
summary: Kick ass, take names, and stop an alien invasion in this thrilling retro action romp, Bill Killem. Storm the rooftops of Los Angeles with guns blazing as you fight for Earth in all its pixel glory.

name: Bioprototype
summary: Bioprototype, a Roguelike & Skill Customizing Rhapsody! This is an auto-bomber with programming elements. Customize your character skills with visual programming, utilize enemy organs to finish the mutation, and construct the ultimate prototype, one can survive in the endless wave of flesh.

name: Bingo Tycoon!
summary: Enjoy Bingo Tycoon games with the award-winning mobile bingo app! Standard and special rules, fun daubers, and custom bingo balls: that's Bingo Tycoon! In our exciting online bingo game, you can play with MULTIPLE bingo cards – more than any other bingo game out there!

name: Big Loot
summary: Roguelike caravan survival game about risk, loot, and smart trading. Every run is a journey of hard choices, clever upgrades, and the eternal question: Do I play it safe... or go for the BIG LOOT?

name: Bite the Crown
summary: In a world ruled by sugary tyrants, an unlikely hero rises from the shadows: Pom the Mold. Build your secret guild, gather rogue treats, lead the rebellion and battle through candy-coated chaos to topple the Candy Kingdom. The Sweet Revolution begins—bite back!

name: Bittersweet Blossoms
summary: A lesbian romance set in England shortly after WWI. The story centres around Dot, a young maid who begins to work in the crumbling stately home of Bly, and her young mistress: the devious, devilish Patience.

name: Biomeat Huskworld
summary: This is the future, Meat is currency. Nobody is giving you time to think about it. QUICK, CONSUME, MAKE CONNECTIONS AND SHOOT MONSTERS.

name: Bitgun Survivors
summary: The first of its kind open-world vampire-survivors game. Explore a dynamic environment, encounter random events, and adapt to survive a zombie outbreak. With upgrades and challenging gameplay, test your skills and adaptability to increase your chances of survival.

name: Bioysque
summary: A retro-style Action RPG in a dark bio-horror environment, both sci-fi and fantasy motives. You are always alone and they are always many. Fight surreal creatures, get experience, explore and gather upgrades - get stronger before the next big Boss fight, learn the truth.

name: Biogenesis
summary: Detective Jodie follows the trail of Madeline to the enigmatic Ravenwood Hotel, a place full of secrets. Solve puzzles, manage a classic inventory, and face deadly enemies and bosses. Explore side missions to gain combat advantages. Every corner brings you closer to the truth.

name: Bir Garip Diyar: Hatunum Nerede?
summary: Our unnamed character returns home one day to find that his girlfriend has been kidnapped and sets out on a journey to find and rescue her.

name: Biathlon Challenge
summary: Master precision shooting while performing stunts to boost your score and beat the clock. Customize your loadout for speed, control, or style. Explore the courses to uncover secrets, gear, and meet the locals.

name: Bird Coloring
summary: Bird Coloring invites you into a peaceful world where creativity flows and stress fades away. Relax as you bring beautiful birds to life with your own unique touch, letting colors blend and imagination soar. It's your moment of calm in a busy world!

name: Bitbird
summary: Bitbird is a 2D platformer where players manipulate gravity to overcome challenging levels. The game starts with monochrome pixel-art and evolves through 4-bit, 8-bit, and 16-bit styles inspired by different gaming eras.

name: Billionaire in the Oil Boom
summary: Wealth, power, greed: in the oil boom of the 1960s, money never sleeps. Invest in stocks, commodities and real estate, acquire companies and manipulate markets to build a financial empire. Use mergers, Ruthless speculation and strategies to dominate the global economy.

name: Bike Baron 2: The Art of Riding
Biofall: Survival
summary: Open-world survival horror game based in 2030, two years after the "cure". Build, survive, and find the truth of the horrors unknown.

name: Bird Game
summary: Bird Game is an abstract, exploration-based RPG with unique, stylized visuals and puzzle mechanics

name: Biodetention
summary: BIODETENTION is a VR stealth-adventure where you sneak, solve, and survive. Outsmart monsters using environmental traps, free fellow captives, and explore an eerie underground facility in a tense, story-driven escape experience—no jump scares.

name: Birds of a Feather
summary:
Long before the age of humans, dinosaurs partook in deadly turf wars. Today, the turf itself has changed dramatically, but still the turf war wages on.

Although the avian descendants of the dinosaurs are much smaller, their fury has only gotten more concentrated. A generational grudge so powerful it can be harnessed and weaponized as devastating laser beams.

Even in death, the birds' ghosts will never forget their anger.

name: Big Winner
summary: In a future where the financial system has collapsed, the lottery becomes a lifeline for survival, with luck as the only currency. As an ordinary person in this predestined world, can you leverage the "Luck System" with courage and wit to rise from obscurity and attain the wealth others covet?

name: BitColony
summary: In this sci-fi simulator game you manage a company charged with colonizing the solar system. Balance company interests, logistics, research, space armadas, politics, buildings, dangerous planets, and outside alien threats.

name: Bit Dancer
summary: BIT DANCER is a simple and casual rhythm game featuring retro original game music and cute pixel art. All you need are the arrow keys and a mouse. It runs in a small window, making it perfect for quick, one-handed play during breaks.

name: Big Theft Valkeala
summary: Open world shooter action game where player controls Terentius Duval in big open world. Mission is hang around and find money bags in big different open world

name: BirdQuest Find the Difference
summary: Find the Differences — A Fun Adventure in the World of Birds!Embark on a colorful journey through 70 levels where all sorts of birds await you: vibrant parrots, exotic birds on roller skates! Some are just chilling on branches, while others surprise with their activity and character.

name: Bibidi Bibidi!
summary: Bibidi Bibidi! is a wizardcore roguelike deckbuilder where you combine cards in your spellbook to cast unique and powerful spells. Crawl through twisting tunnels and fight maddening monsters to find the perfect build for your wizard. Every turn is a puzzle!

name: Bird Like
summary: Bird Like is a casual roguelite flight game where you soar toward destination, dodging all kinds of obstacles along the way. Pick upgrades, equip mysterious artifacts, and build your own path. What awaits at the edge of the world? Time is running out. The most important thing is—just keep going.

name: Birdoo
summary: Birdoo is an indie action game were you take control of a bird on his quest for revenge against the humans that mistreated him. For too long have you been called a flying rat and shooed away. It's time to take revenge!

name: Biggest Piano
summary: A short comedic horror adventure where you investigate the mystery of a piano that won’t stop growing.

name: Birthday of Horrors
summary: It’s your party, you’ll scream if you want to.

name: Bigfoot Hunting
summary: Hunt the legend and survive the untamed wilderness.

name: Bioneers
summary: A strategy and simulation game set in a microworld. Build an organism from cells, automate biological processes, and fend off viral attacks. Explore the world, unlock mutations, and evolve into a predator, parasite, or herbivore. Survive, adapt, and grow.

name: Bio Blaster
summary: Bio Blaster is a Space FPS where you play as a Bio Ship pilot tasked with protecting a giant space beast from hostile contagions.

name: Bionicle: Masks of Power - Legacy
summary:
Remember those toys you played with as a kid? These are those. Play as your favorite Toa heroes and explore the mystic island of Mata-Nui. Find Villages, fight Rahi, talk to matoran, and experience quests.

The (Legacy) in the title refers to this being the Legacy/Original branch of the project, The rebuilt branch being 2.0, which will have it's own page once it is released.

This version of the game has been finished, while some minor patches or fixes may come to this version, no other content is being planned on. We recommend downloading Via the Itch.io App to get quicker updates.

name: Billy the Kid
summary: Shoot down as many of these renegade as you can with your colt through a hundred of levels that are becoming harder and harder. Show your dexterity and rapidity with your pistols and save the city before the sun set.

name: Bio Hazard
summary:
Bio Hazard is a port of Resident Evil for the Korean mobile phone models SCH-G100 and SPH-G1000, released on 15 June 2005. It is the first title localized for Korea.

The game was distributed through the GXG platform for the SCH-G100 and GPANG for SPH-G1000, where buyers had to download the game to a PC and then transfer the files to a compatible phone.

name: Biohazard Outbreak Survive
summary: Biohazard Outbreak Survive is a mobile phone game released in Japan in 2011 for the GREE social networking service. Survive was free-to-play with purchasable upgrades. The game was up from 20 June 2011 until the server closure on 29 May 2015. As of 23 May 2012, the game had exceeded 2 million users. The game's servers shut down in 2015 following the bankruptcy of its developer, Applica.

name: Biohazard Survival Door
summary:
BIOHAZARD Survival Door is a mobile phone game, released in 2010.

Survival Door was only released for Japanese mobile phones, at a download price of 315 yen for SoftBank, docomo and au systems.

name: Biohazard The Episodes
summary: BIOHAZARD the episodes is a mobile phone game released in 2007. It was announced in September 2006 to take advantage of the new FOMA 903i phone's 1MB size limit for apps and 3D gaming capabilities.

name: Biohazard The Operations
summary: Biohazard The Operations is a mobile phone game, released in 2007. It is the sequel to BIOHAZARD the episodes, and is based on the remake of Resident Evil. OPERATIONS was only released for Japanese mobile phones, at a download price of 525 yen.

name: Biohazard The Stories
summary: Biohazard The Stories is a mobile phone game based on Resident Evil 3: Nemesis. THE STORIES was first released on docomo phones in 2004, followed by au and SoftBank phones in 2005 and 2007, respectively. It is the sequel to Resident Evil: The Missions. The game was never released outside of Japan and was followed by a sequel, BIOHAZARD the episodes.

name: Biohazard ZombieBuster
summary: BIOHAZARD ZombieBuster is a mobile phone game, first released in 2001 and later remastered in 2011. While the 2001 version was made available to western countries in 2006, the 2011 remake ZombieBuster was only released for Japanese mobile phones at a download price of 315 yen.

name: Billy's Tower
summary: A platformer about climbing as high as you can. Also, you might encounter enemies along the way.

name: Big Burger Tower
summary: How high can you stack ingredients to build the tallest burger before it all comes crashing down?! Test your skills in this fun game! Join the ranking challenge and compete to see who can build the biggest burger!

name: Birth of X
summary: Birth Of X is an atmospheric psychological horror about the pain of loss. A mysterious box left at your doorstep sets off a chain of terrifying events. Solve symbolic puzzles and face what crawls behind you…

name: Billy Went to a Carnival
summary:
Ten years ago, a girl went missing. Her friend recalls the events that lead to the night of her disappearance and the terrifying truth of a legend that turned out to be real...
Something horrible happened that night. The night that...Billy went to a carnival.

name: BiColor: Lazy Eye Game Trainer
summary: Fun and interactive vision therapy game for amblyopia (lazy eye) and strabismus. Train binocular vision using anaglyph glasses or an occluder through mini-games that improve focus, coordination, and visual perception. Suitable for kids and adults.

name: Bion Clash
summary: Dive into a chaotic, free-to-play party royale set in a hilarious dystopian future! Compete in absurd minigames, explore a vibrant sci-fi world, and outsmart your friends in this ever-evolving social adventure.

name: Birza
summary: A desktop birding simulator.Here, you won't need to worry about feeding or raising the birds.Simply leave it running quietly on your desktop, and adorable birds will visit on their own.You can purchase food and feed them.Use the camera to capture their cute moments.Create personalized birding books.

name: Biomass: Extermination
summary: Biomass: Extermination is a first-person sci-fi shooter game, set in a world destroyed by alien invasion, created entirely by solo developer using Unreal Engine.

name: Birdteeth
summary: Birdteeth is a casual, single-player creature collector where you get to observe, feed, and befriend birds. Train your feathered companions, reshape the world around you, and interact with hidden secrets and puzzles left over from ancient times.

name: Big Bird's Special Delivery
summary:
Big Bird's Special Delivery is a pre-school computer game where the player can practise classification of objects. In a playful setting of shops, Big Bird and Little Bird work to deliver mail to one of four locations. This computer activity aims to teach children understanding of form class and function. The objects are controlled by pressing one of three keys on the computer keyboard to control Little Bird.

When a round of play is completed the shops will light up after the mail is correctly delivered. If there is a mail mix-up, the shopkeepers gently point out mistakes and encourage the child to try again.

name: Bingo Bugglebee Presents: Home Alone
summary:
Bingo Bugglebee Presents: Home Alone is an educational game about home safety for multiple systems.

Played on a 5 x 5 bingo card, the player is asked multiple choice questions about home safety for every box they select. If the player answers correctly, they get the space and a single point, and are blocked from the space if they answer incorrectly. The player gains 5 bonus points if they score 5 in a row, and Bingo Bugglebee dances for the player. The goal is to score as many points as possible.

name: Bianka Lovesick
summary: In classic survival horror fashion, in Bianka Lovesick you explore many places looking for items in order to advance. Collect Ammo and heal items to increase your chances of surviving this nightmare. Each decision counts, so think twice on which enemy to kill and with what weapon.

name: Big Theft Valkeala 2: San Piritori
summary: Terentius Duval is back in this open world shooter. Mission is again collect money bags and now he can use money to buy weapons and beautiful cars

name: Bit Lost
summary: Bit Lost is a single-player atmospheric first-person game set inside a broken digital space. Explore fragments of consciousness to uncover what happened and find a way out. +You can now explore Bit Lost in a special split-screen co-op mode.

name: Big Giant Tanghulu: Tanghulu Legend
summary: I want more Tanghulu! Stack more Tanghulu and unlock skins for the girl who loves sweets

name: Big Bond Theory
summary: Contain unstable atoms and create molecules using the Big Bond Theory. Strategically stabilize atomic structures across 70 levels. Learn about chemical structures of everyday products through two game modes. Features Game Center achievements, intuitive gameplay, and graphics that highlight the atomic world. Players can share their progress and compete on leaderboards. A downloadable Lite version offers the first 10 levels for preview.

name: Bilge Su Bullet Baroness
summary: Bilge Su: Bullet Baroness is a mission-based first-person shooter where you take on waves of enemies with powerful weapons and explosives. Fight through linear combat zones, complete objectives, and survive without checkpoints. Pure action from start to finish.

name: Biscuit Mafia
summary: Biscuit Mafia is an action-shooter where you have to defend your oven from the ruthless Biscuit Mafia, deep in the heart of the jungle! Survive three intense minutes armed with nothing but feathers, screams and bizarre power-ups!

name: BitSlaps
summary: BitSlaps is a chaotic, interactive multiplayer game where streamers become gladiators and viewers pull the strings. Compete in outrageous challenges, survive sabotage, and rage your way through custom maps built for laughs, skill, and pure madness.

name: Big Beautiful Van Derby Racing
summary: Take your old van to the derby track and battle against other drivers in exciting and thrilling races. Battle for the win and customize your Big, BEAUTIFUL, Van to your preference with your own custom paint scheme.

name: Birdhouse
summary: A short narrative-driven horror game made in RPGmaker featuring hand-drawn graphics and animated cutscenes. Players navigate the house and its backyard, interacting with the environment and collecting key items to progress the story.

name: Bioleech
summary: Bioleech is a satirical FPS that blends fast-paced action with recycling and resource-management mechanics. Beneath the appearance of a “planetary rehabilitation mission,” players uncover an oppressive corporate system exploiting both the environment and its workers. A “serious anti-game” that uses dark humor and social critique to make you reflect while fighting for survival.

name: BitHero Survivors
summary: BitHero Survivors is a survivors-like pixel-art action RPG. Unique heroes, classic RPG-style Armor Slots, evolving weapons and powerful accessory set bonuses. Survive relentless waves of enemies—and become a true hero!

name: Biorage
summary: Fight, Adapt, and Survive Across Time. Biorage is an intense story-driven FPS set in a fractured timeline where the rebellious force "Freedom for All Rebellion" clashes against the corporate empire "Tempus Industries". Experience 15 meticulously crafted levels across 5 visually stunning chapters, where time itself is your greatest enemy. After the main character gets trapped by Tempus in a failed mission, you're left isolated—stranded between past, present, and a future spiraling into chaos.

name: Bibelgame
summary: A 2D platformer game that brings biblical stories to life in a playful way. Collect scrolls, solve puzzles, and experience the Bible like never before – exciting, educational, and designed for children.

name: Bitcoin Chill
summary: Bitcoin Chill - a simulator of meditative purchasing and selling bitcoins with pleasant music will let you relax and escape from your everyday life.The concept of the game is very simple - you shouldn't be afraid of bankruptcy or thirst for wealth, all you need to do is relax.

name: Bizzare Cat Rescuer
summary: A strange homeless-looking man unsuccessfully tries to escape from an equally strange schizophrenic self-destructing world in 10 minutes, saving cats along the way. It is completely unclear what is happening. And it will not become clearer...

name: Bishoujo Senshi Sailor Moon S GG2SMS
Birdcage
summary:
BIRDCAGE is an arcade-style vertical scrolling shoot’em up inspired by genre classics, blending gritty pixel art sprites with 2.5D backdrops and a pumping retro soundtrack! Blast through 6 unique stages of bullet hell mayhem, facing off against enemy swarms using multiple shot types and rechargeable specials.

Chase high scores by maintaining chains and kill rate. Strategically activate Hyperblade mode in tense situations, and take down screen-filling bosses! Can you break free of your cage and redeem humanity?

name: Binary Game
summary: This is a simple luck-based game where players generate a random 30-digit binary number. The goal is to win by having all digits be either 0s or 1s. With extremely low odds of success, the game offers a fun challenge and a sense of achievement when winning.

name: Binarycurse
summary: This is a password game that decrypts hidden information by finding it. You need to be very careful to find the password to solve the puzzle. It is a very difficult game!

name: Bitcoin Billionaire: Bitstone To The Past
summary:
What is the sound of one hand tapping? The return of Bitcoin Billionaire that is what!
After a huge launch, the idle clicker that really set the pace for mobile clickers everywhere is back with an update that triples, yes triples, the amount of content! The update hits iTunes Aug 6th and Android Aug 13th.
Players might remember that eventually you are prompted to invest in time travel in the original game. Well now that investment is paying off as the time machine is active and players can be transported to the prehistoric era in Bitstone to the Past!
Enter a new world filled with dinosaurs, fossils, and woolly mammoths that double as vacuum cleaners. Brand new investments, upgrades, news ticker items, and more, all waiting for your tap-happy hands to unlock.
The update features 25 new investments, 4 new rooms, 20+ room items, new achievements as well as a new rare item and re-investment system for both eras that opens up endless mining opportunities.
The game also includes a new supercharges to get the most out of your taps and investments along with a handful of UI improvements, social leaderboards, stats and cloud saving between devices.
It is time to get sucked back into the world of endless tapping. The only question is, do you have the Bitstones for it?

name: Bikini Brickout
summary: Old-school golden age arcade gameplay, featuring 700 photos of beautiful swimsuit models

name: Big Jays Rattastic Adventure
summary: Big Jays Rattastic Adventure is a 3D mascot platformer game with tons of collectibles. Every level can be finished without collecting anything, but the more stuff you grab, the better grade you get at the end of each level. Unlock more levels and stuff by getting higher grades on previous levels.

name: Bike Runner
summary: Welcome to the ultimate proving ground for fearless cyclists. This is a world where skill is everything, and your next ride is always more demanding than the last. Carve your path down treacherous mountainsides, launch off impossibly huge ramps, and chain together insane trick combinations to dominate the leaderboards. Every jump, every whip, and every landing is a test of precision.

name: Bing Chilling
summary: This is an minimalist clicker game called bing chilling. In this game you will be clicking an ice cream, and with each click you will gain one more ice cream. The only goal in this game is to gain more ice creams.

name: Big Scary
summary: Big scary is an indie horror virtual reality experience. Inspired by gameplay predecessors like Gorilla Tag, Big scary offers a sprawling underground world, with a plethora of monsters and dexterity-defying challenges to test players of all skill levels.

name: Biida-Bash
summary: Experience the thrill of a marbles tabletop game with physics-bending powers! Dive into this turn-based multiplayer action, challenging friends, family, or strangers across different mini-games with unique challenges. It's all about calculated moves and chaotic fun!

name: Bist Squad
summary: Bist squad is a short, tactical dungeon crawler where you hatch strange eggs, evolve your creatures, and face off in auto-resolved battles. No tutorials. No hand-holding. Just discovery. Learn the mechanics by playing and experimenting.

name: Bishoujo Tennis
summary: This is an affordable and fun casual tennis game featuring anime-style pretty girls. The gameplay is very simple—just slide the screen with the mouse. There are over ten pretty girls to choose from, allowing players to freely select both their own character and their opponent's.

name: Bite Night: Dine or Die
summary: Bite Night: Dine or Die is a First-Person horror thriller where you play as a diner worker trying to solve the murders of your customers along side your best friend Vamp.

name: Big Beautiful Women: Giantess Dating Action
summary: If you like big girls, this is the game for you. Play as a college student trying to find love in a city full of giant ladies. 5 lovely ladies to woo, 5 stats to manage, and 10 endings to reach. Can you fall in love before you graduate?

name: Bily'Sine
summary: The story of a young boy transported to the mysterious world of Bily'Sine by a magical pearl. To return home, he must explore unknown lands, face magicians in bullet-hell magic duels and make choices that will influence his adventure and the fate of the world. Each decision reveals new secrets and mysteries to unravel.

name: BioMenace Remastered
summary: The classic 2D action platformer BioMenace returns with enhanced graphics and refined gameplay. Fight your way through a city ravaged by dangerous mutants, rescue hostages, find secrets and rack up points. Locate the secret lab behind this attack and prevent Dr. Mangle from taking over the world!

name: Biblically Inaccurate
summary: A fast-paced subversive endless runner, where you play as the runner's guardian angel. Protect them with your mouse by clicking and dragging obstacles out of the way as they running through ancient rome.

name: BioShock 2: Kill 'em Kindly
summary: Kill 'em Kindly is a game mode for BioShock 2 Multiplayer released as a Downloadable Content on May 11th, 2010, alongsides the Rapture Metro Pack and the Zigo & Blanche DLC. In this game mode, the players can only use golf clubs to strike enemies with melee attacks. This mode is free to download on the Xbox Live, and the PlayStation Network. It was also free to download on the Games for Windows Live online platform for PC until its closure, but is now included on the regular game on Steam.

name: BioShock 2: Rapture Metro Pack
summary: The Rapture Metro Map Pack is the second downloadable content for BioShock 2 Multiplayer. It launched on May 11, 2010 on Xbox Live, Game for Windows Live and PlayStation Network for $9.99 (800 Microsoft Points). This pack focuses on new multiplayer maps and an additional feature to prolong the game's experience.

name: Big Band Survivors
summary: Build your band, unlock powerful relics, and slay hordes in sync with the beat. Big Band Survivors is a rhythm-based roguelite that combines the visceral gameplay of the Survivors-like genre with musically interwoven game mechanics.

name: Bible Trivia: Alchemy
summary: Combine the elements of Creation and reveal the stories of the Bible! In Bible Trivia – Alchemy, each new fusion unlocks biblical characters, objects, and events. Experience the joy of discovering the sacred world — one element at a time.

name: Bibi Blocksberg: Big Broom Race 4
summary: Whizz-whizz: The race continues!

name: Bikkuriman 2000 Kamereon Zantei no Inbou
summary: Bikkuriman 2000 Kamereon Zantei no Inbou is an unreleased Sega Dreamcast game based on the Bikkuriman 2000 anime series.

name: Bipedal Party
summary: Master delightful two-legged chaos across two acclaimed co-op adventures.

name: Bingo Betty
summary: This ain't your average grandma's bingo! Put your bingo skills to the test in this strategic roguelite spin on the classic game as you collect items, customize cards, create combos, cash in scratch tickets, and take betty to the top!

name: Birdwatching Notebook
summary: Build cozy birdwatching spots on balconies, docks, cliffs, rainforests, or deserts, and wait for lovely birds to visit. A gentle desktop idle game—like tiny postcards on your screen, where beautiful scenes and cute birds accompany your quiet moments.

name: Bio-Breaker
summary: A top-down 2D pixel art zombie shooter. Featuring 20+ enemies, 7 upgradeable weapons, 6 active abilities and passive perks, unlockable player skins and more!

name: Bikepacking Simulator
summary: Bikepacking and cycle touring simulation game. Survive with the resources you carry on your bike as you travel through different environments and routes. Camp in your tent, buy food, manage your energy and inventory, and embark on the adventure of freely traveling by bike.

name: Bite Me
summary: Bite Me was a classic Facebook vampire battle game where you built your clan, bit other players, levelled up your powers, and dominated the night. A fun mix of strategy, PvP, and dark humour that everyone used to grind back in the day.

name: Bible Puzzle: Christian Game
summary: Bible Puzzle offers a relaxing and uplifting experience as you piece together beautiful biblical scenes. When you're fully relaxed, it's time to take on the challenge of ranked matches. Think you've got what it takes to beat other players?

name: Bienvenue au club Tom-Tom et Nana
summary: Join Tom-Tom and Nana's club! Like them, be resourceful, inventive, and full of humor to complete your missions: manage restaurant service, wash Poussin the dog and prepare the ghost party. You can also make membership cards for your own club, invitation cards... and more thanks to the creative workshop!

name: Bird Game 3
summary: Bird Game 3 is an immersive Multiplayer BvB (Bird vs. Bird) game, now finally coming to Steam! Select your favorite bird and fight other birds for domination over the bird realm!

name: BitQuest
summary: Embark on a pixel multiplayer RPG adventure in a vast, procedurally generated world. Crafted by indie Last Life Games, BitQuest offers slow-burning survival, co-op camp building, and mysterious quests. Face unpredictable bosses, explore dungeons, and discover rare loot!

name: Biryado
summary: Biryado is a billiard roguelike with deck-building elements. Strategically combine various artefact powers and unique balls to create synergies, earn extreme scores, and beat Billy.

name: Bit Buddy
summary: Bit Buddy reacts in real-time to your keyboard and mouse activity. Every click and movement brings an adorable response from your little companion. Even better, each interaction gives you a chance to unlock new decorations, with no extra effort required!

name: Bird Game 3
summary: Bird Game 3 is a multiplayer bird-battle simulator where you and your flock defend your eggs and raid rival nests. Choose from a diverse roster of birds, each with unique abilities and playstyles.

name: Bird Game 3
summary: Bird Game 3 is an online competitive 5v5 PvP game where players choose from a variety of bird classes and fight to protect their team's eggs while attempting to steal or destroy the enemy's. Begin by hiding each of your team's nests, creating unique points of interest to defend.

name: Bird
summary: In Bird, collect hand-drawn animations and recorded interviews to reveal the heart-wrenching true story of Darrell Fair, an artist and activist wrongfully convicted in 1998 and still fighting for his freedom. Bird is an intimate, artistic journey that asks what would you do to set a caged bird free?

name: Big Game Bundle 10-in-1
summary: 10 in 1 Games Bundle – Complete Your Library with a Diverse Set of Exciting Titles! Looking for a pack full of fun, variety, and hours of entertainment?

name: Bird Game 3
summary: A fast, chaotic bird-based PvP game where you fly, fight, steal eggs, and trash-talk in proximity chat. Perch, ragdoll, eat worms, and yes, you can play as a shoebill.

name: BioMech Vendetta
summary: A forgotten world awakens — where nature and machine have become one. Step into the boots of an elite soldier sent to reclaim a planet consumed by biomechanical life.

name: Birdseed VR
summary: Snap pics of the chunkiest, cutest birds in VR! Relax in lush forests, complete quirky daily quests, and fill your Journal. Whether you’re birding alone or together with friends, get cozy and escape to nature.

name: Birds and Nuts
summary: "Birds and Nuts" is a game where you move the bird left and right to drop nuts. If you match 3 or more nuts of the same type, they will disappear. Will you be able to keep collecting nuts in various situations, such as rolling nuts and birds that get in your way?

name: Bird Game III
summary: A competitive arena PvP game where agile birds battle for control of objectives using fast movement, abilities, and coordinated teamplay. Master unique species, outmaneuver opponents, and clutch intense aerial showdowns.

name: Biolune
summary: An artificial life simulation about a robot cultivating ecosystems on the moons of a ruined planet. Grow fantastical plants and animals, facilitate their evolution, and gather resources while discovering the secrets of this strange world.

name: Billion Bounces
summary: Billion Bounces is a short incremental game with bouncing balls, targets, and one goal: earn coins, buy upgrades, and watch the economy slowly fall apart.

name: Billie's Wheelie
summary: Billie's Wheelie is an adventure racing platformer game, You can play it with up to 8 players Co-op/PvP, Playing as a hamster in his ball trying to beat all challenges, Collecting all cheese pieces for rewards, And beating your friend's time records.

name: Biovoid
summary: Biovoid is a creature-building roguelike game that tests your creativity. As a fragile hatchling alone in the abyss, your only objective is to consume and adapt. Will you survive the perils that await and evolve to the top of this alien foodchain?

name: Bibimba wo Mazesaseruna
summary: It's a game where you don't mix the bibimbap.

name: Biplanes
summary: Soar into WWI dogfights with arcade-style aerial combat and thrilling multiplayer action!

name: Bird Brigade
summary: Become birds together with your friends — each one has different perks and stats, and some have unique abilities. Try various game modes and have fun in Bird Brigade. The game is inspired by AI-generated TikTok videos about Bird Game 3.

name: Bishoujo Senshi Sailor Moon R: Sailor Senshi Sanjou!
Bishoujo Senshi Sailor Moon R: Moon Sensation!
Bit Breaker
summary: Bit Breaker is a short brick-breaking incremental bullet hell. Collect resources to upgrade your balls and fight back against the nodes taking over humanity.

name: Bit//Cycle
summary: bit//Cycle is a fast-paced top-down rogue-lite where you cleanse a corrupted computer system. Move fast as the heroic bit, or risk shrinking away to nothing. Procedural levels, grid-based movement, and permadeath make every choice matter.

name: Bit-cremental: Fishistry Color
summary:
Introducing Bit-cremental: Fishistry Color!
Take your Game Boy nostalgia to the next level with this vibrant DLC!

This is my way of saying thank you for supporting the development of this game—and future projects to come. The Fishistry Color DLC doesn’t affect gameplay balance or progression, but it adds a splash of color and charm to your fish-raising experience.

Your support means the world, and this DLC is a small way to give back while helping us continue to create and expand this world.

Thank you for all of your support—happy fishing!

*You can utilize the DLC in the "Palette" menu in-game by toggling "Full Color".

name: Big Balls
summary: Big Balls is a First/Third-Person Multiplayer party game with proximity voice and unique movement system. Compete against friends in a variety of gamemodes and maps to decide the winner. Who will be the biggest Ball?
